Summary: Montage's poolside restaurant gets an A++. Gorgeous setting to enjoy an incredibly tasty lunch on the water. Adam our server was the best!   He didn't rush us, took a lot of pride in what he did, and well-represented the Montage Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Andee,  Thank you for your feedback about Mosaic Bar and Grille - I look forward to sharing your comments with Adam and the entire team! Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager

Summary: The food was a 10/10, but the thing that blew me away was the friendliness I encountered from everyone at mosaic.  The host Melina, the server Emilie, and the managers Paul and Renzo really made our day!
Manager Response: Dear CBear,  Thank you for sharing your experience at Mosaic Bar and Grille, especially your comments about our team. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another memorable experience soon.  Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: My family visited the Montage Hotel in August 2021 specifically to take advantage of the beach access being so close to the hotel. I was interested in going to the spa and specifically using the sauna for the weekend we stayed. I was told by spa staff that they were booked completely for massages but had an opening for a pedicure and could use the sauna and other spa amenities only if I booked an appointment for spa service. I took the appointment. The day of the
Manager Response: Dear Brittanie,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Summary Heading: Best Beach Resort in the Continental US
Summary: If you‚Äôre looking for a luxury beach resort that doesn‚Äôt involve international travel or the long flight to HI, this is it.  Second time at this wonderful hotel - this time for 9 days and we‚Äôll be back again.  Wonderful views, beach, food, gym, spa and most of all people. Summary: We recently stayed at the hotel.  Unfortunately my husbands injured foot caused him to fall and I wasn't nearby to help.  The staff - security - had taken control and by the time my son and I rushed back from the beach they had him on the way to emergency.  Their kindness, efficiency, compassion and help made a tough experience less stressful.  Prior to this incident we were having the best time. Manager Response: Dear Diane,  First of all, I hope that your husband has recovered from his fall and I am sorry to hear that this happened during an otherwise enjoyable trip. However I am happy to hear that our Security team was able to attend to the situation quickly and professionally. I am delighted to hear that your return trip is already reserved and if there is anything we can do to make your upcoming stay even better than the last, please do not hesitate to reach out to me directly.  Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager

Summary: COVID has made it extraordinarily difficult for those in the travel industry. So it a good indicator as to how good a service provider is if they can maintain the highest standards in spite of this. Such was the case for a special dining experience we had at the Loft restaurant in the Montage. A complicated scenario that involved a custom Birthday cake, custom flowers for the table, the perfect table, and prepayment for the dinner bill was deftly handled by the restaurant manager Julien. The food was great, the service was excellent, the sunset spectacular, and my companions were very happy and content. Thanks again Julien & Co.!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came for girls weekend and had the best time. Montage Laguna Beach I will be back soon.  Thank you for the memories.

Manager Response: Dear Ashton,  Thank you for sharing your feedback about your experiences with Daniella at Concierge. Summary Heading: Impeccable service from some incredible people

When we go to the Four Seasons DC, for example, EVERY staff member is fully alert and able to anticipate needs - with the smile and intelligence you would expect at a five star.  The service at the

Summary Heading: Left a lot to be desired

We paid a small fortune for our 4 night stay to celebrate our 20th anniversary.  Our package included a credit for breakfast.  We were told they weren't operating at full capacity due to staff shortages  and they weren't permitted to serve a buffet, so breakfast became a hassle and dinner reservations were hard to come by.  We also had to wait until 4:00 PM each day to have our room serviced.  The staff did apologize and did the best they could
Manager Response: Dear 513deem,  Thank you for your honest feedback and please accept our apologies for your disappointing experience. Although staffing has been a challenge since the pandemic, it is still not an excuse for failure to deliver five star service. We have since introduced a breakfast buffet option at The Loft and continue to hire associates as quickly as we can. I do hope that when your travels bring you back to Southern California that you will give us the chance to win you back as a guest. I would be happy to personally see to the details of your stay.  Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Hands down one of the best hotels in the world. Excellent all around

The room at $1600 a night is too pricey in my opinion for what you get.  I've traveled all over the world, and many spectacular Four seasons properties as much less expensive with more to offer.  I have to mention the toilet.  The first morning I could not flush it.  I

Summary: The property has some nice features, but is sorely overpriced and with small showers that seemed like a phone booth.  I liked the nearby Ritz Carlton better, which had much better rooms.    Some of the staff were very nice, including one of our waitresses and the housekeeping crew.
Manager Response: Dear Bi11ye1,  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Summary: Recently stayed at this fabulous resort with my two boys, aged 12 and 14.  We had a beautiful ocean facing room that was very spacious with two queen beds. Summary: We had a wonderful time and an awesome room.  We only had one tiny hiccup during our stay.  After checking in, we went to the Loft for dinner and were seated in the bar area.  After a little wait, the water server asked if our waitress had come over yet.  We told him no.  We were not impatient at all and were enjoying the relaxation after a long day of driving.  The waitress came over said, "Sorry about the wait, I'm just very busy!"  We had not asked for an explanation.  However, her comment made us want to say that we were sorry to be a bother.  We just felt the comment was rude and uncalled for.  We did love everything about the visit and had we not been tired from a long drive in LA, her comment might not have offended us.  We did tip her the customary 22% for our service.
Manager Response: Dear eastridgevince,  Thank you for sharing your review with us. While I am delighted to hear that your stay was a memorable one, I am sorry that your experience with the service at The Loft started your visit off on the wrong foot. I have addressed this instance with the team  to assure that this impression is never given in the future. We value your feedback and always share with our teams so that we continue to grow and offer the five star level of service our guests deserve.  Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: My wife and I had our wedding here and it was amazing. The location is gorgeous. The views and scenery made our wedding location ideal.   The food and service were also fantastic. Our guests gave a lot of very positive feedback on how great the food, staff, and service was.  Thank you Montage staff for making our wedding a dream. We really appreciate it! We look forward to visiting again soon!  Jeff & Elizabeth
Manager Response: Dear Jeff and Elizabeth,  Thank you for choosing Montage Laguna Beach as the location for your wedding. We are honored that you put your trust in us to help execute your special day and I am delighted to hear that your experiences with our team members met and exceeded your expectations. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to the resort soon for future anniversary celebrations.  Sincerely,  Mary Rogers General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Great views and even GREATER people!!!

The way they ALWAYS welcomed us with smiles and true postures of service and delight; set the tone for an awesome stay. No matter where we went, EVERYONE had the same refreshing attitude!  The spa was fantastic!!! We enjoyed a 90-minute couples massage that left us feeling invigorated and relaxed. I enjoyed the whirlpool that revived my sore muscles. The best we ever had!  We started out staying two nights, but enjoyed
Manager Response: Dear runforlegacy,  Thank you for sharing such a glowing review with us about your recent stay with us. I have shared your feedback with Nick, Tyler and Mateo, as well as the team at Spa Montage and the entire resort. Summary: This last week we visited the Montage Laguna Beach and we had an amazing time. Summary: For my 60th birthday, my husband reserved 3 nights in an Ocean Surf King room (500 sq ft at $1,650 per night + $50 per night resort fee), ordered a white orchid flower arrangement and made dinner reservations at The Loft to celebrate.  We arrived 10 minutes before check in and were told that room service was just finishing our room.  We sat in the lobby enjoying a glass of wine (non-complimentary) and checked back twice in 45 minutes to see if the room was ready.  After an hour had passed, we checked back a third time and were then shown to our room by a front-desk host.  When the host unlocked the door, we discovered that the room was already been occupied by two guests.  It turned out that another host mistook them for us and gave them our room by mistake minutes before.  A

Summary Heading: The Staff Is What Makes This Place Great
Summary: This past week I visited The Montage Laguna Beach and there is a lot to be said. I an amazing time at the property. Despite being located on a beautiful beach with endless amenities and beautiful rooms, what really made this trip special was the staff I encountered during my four-day stay:  Jordan + Jasmine in reservations who helped manage and book my reservation.   Kyle - The front desk associate who checked me in and then further went out of his way to give a tour of the property before walking my guest and me directly to our room.   Jimmy - The bellman who brought our bags up and informed us of all the best spots on the property and the surrounding area  Adrian- The skilled bartender who went out of his way to make sure my guest and I were always doing okay throughout our

Summary: I was able to book our stay through Amex so we got a few more perks such as breakfast, a spa credit, and late check-out. The property is stunning. The service was amazing. Manager Response: none

Summary: I recently took a quick business trip to Laguna Beach, CA from Miami and had the fortunate opportunity to stay at Montage Laguna Beach.   What a treat!  It was truly a flawless stay.  The hotel is impeccable!  The grounds are stunningly beautiful and so well kept.  The landscaping and maintenance is top notch and the view from the lobby is truly one of a kind.    But as usual, it is the associates of any hotel that make a hotel stay memorable and this was also the case at Montage Laguna beach.  I arrived very late, and John greeted me at the door.  John is the overnight hotel manager, who has worked at this hotel for over 13 years and while walking me to my room, he gave me some great insight into the resort.  I ordered dine in breakfast twice during my stay and Israel was my

Summary: What can one say. It‚Äôs the Montage.     One of the best spots in California. Covid compliant, which means nothing was open. But. Next time for sure. We had a great time, look forward to many more stays.    Weather was amazing, our room had a beautiful view.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words! We look forward to welcoming you back for your next stay - please do let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next visit even more memorable.  Sincerely,  Rick Riess Vice President Montage International

Summary: We frequently stay at the Montage Hotel when we are in town and by far, the nicest hotel in the area.  There Villas are very nice and they are also DOG FRIENDLY which is a plus for us.  All the staff were very professional and friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and for choosing Montage Laguna Beach. We look forward to welcoming you - and your pooch - back to the resort soon. Wishing you a safe and healthy year ahead! Sincerely,  Rick Riess Vice President Montage International

The adult pool has a fun and sophisticated vibe.   However, this hotel has significant shortcomings. The hallways leading to our room were scuffed and unattractive. More importantly, the view from our room was extraordinarily disappointing. At $1100 a night, the ocean was  truly distant. Instead, I
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough review and candid feedback. While I am happy that your dining and pool experiences were enjoyable, I am sorry to hear that you were disappointed by the room view and features. We offer several different view types and room categories, however I will be sure to connect with our team regarding your issues around cleanliness. Sincerely,  Rick Riess Vice President Montage International

Summary: We spent the weekend celebrating our oldest daughter‚Äôs birthday and the facility and staff did a great job taking care of us.  Even during COVID, we felt safe and protected in the villa.  The beach access and pool were easy to get to and very clean and private.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Montage Laguna Beach to celebrate your daughter's birthday. Sincerely,  Rick Riess Vice President Montage International

Summary: Highly recommend it. Definitely an amazing stay for work and relax! Great location for a resort with very good facilities including wonderful spa treatments for a pleasant stay in Laguna Beach. Top notch.

Summary: We had beautiful surroundings, incredible guest services, fine dining and sunshine:)!  A much needed break in these unpredictable times.  We felt very safe in regards to Covid.  Highly recommend for families!

The manager

Montage staff are worth observing for their genuine kindness and courtesy, which includes simple greetings. The rooms and services here are true luxury, the restaurants are all high quality, and I consider the Studio restaurant worthy of its own trip for a meal at sunset.  I do wish it was a better place to launch an outdoor run or walk, but on the other hand the Spa‚Äôs full size lap pool in the morning was its own five star experience. Laguna Beach is a special place, come here for relaxed luxury by the beach and pool with dramatic views all around.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us. I am delighted to hear the feedback about your visit, especially your mentions about our associates. Thank you for being our guest at several Montage properties as well - Montage Los Cabos just opened last month so hopefully you can add a fourth property to your list! We hope to see you here at Montage Laguna Beach again soon as well.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Ultimate expression of how a luxurious hotel should be ideally located. As you enter the lobby, you are welcomed by the grandiosity of the picture perfect view of Laguna beach stunning pool, beautiful architecture and well maintained garden.  If you are entertaining guests visiting Southern CA for the first time and you need them to see what our beaches and parks  can offer, start with this hotel, have lunch and walk around their public park. Enjoy top notch accommodation, good restaurants and fantastic service - this is the place to go. I have one word for this place- Amazing!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean beach on resort property.  Perfect area for tide pools, sun bathing and exploring.  You can take Wesley Street down to the parking garage.  It's a little bit of a hike down to the beach area but it is paved.  They have shower facilities and lifeguards on the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review! We agree - Montage Laguna Beach is fortunate enough to be situated on one of the most beautiful stretches of coastline in Southern California. Enjoy your summer at the beach!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The place is amazing. I love walking near the ocean. The grounds are beautiful. Had lunch at mosaic and the salads are off the charts good! If you want to celebrate a special occasion this is the place. Their service is impeccable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a lovely family dinner overlooking the ocean. The food was beautiful and delicious. The service was out of this world. Five waiters would arrive behind us and set our plates down at the same time--a LOVELY treat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was 5 star from the service, to the restaurants, to the spa/fitness, to the housekeeping! We usually stray away from the hotel to find local restaurants; but had 3 nights of dining at Montage and enjoyed every meal! The Spa/Fitness center was great with great instruction from "Sophie from Sweden" teaching the Surf Board fitness class".  One day, I was the only group fitness student, but Sophie made me feel like she enjoyed teaching the class of "1"...now that is a great instructor.  THANK YOU SOPHIE!   We would love to return to Montage Laguna Beach and recommend it to our friends!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us and for being our guest. I appreciate the feedback and am delighted to hear of your memorable experiences from Spa Montage to dining. Truly no need to leave property during your stay! I look forward to sharing your feedback with our associates, and Sophie in particular. We look forward to welcoming you back to Montage Laguna Beach soon.  Sincerely,  Anne Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: This is a ‚Äúpool resort‚Äù not a ‚Äúbeach resort‚Äù
Summary: I just returned from a 3 night getaway with my 6 year old son.  The first night we stayed at the Legoland castle and finished the trip with 2 nights at the Montage in Laguna.  I spent the majority of my waking hours sitting on a towel in the sand with my back against a rock, a far cry from what I had envisioned when I booked this trip.  When we arrived on a Sunday afternoon, our room was not ready, and my son bee-lined it for the beach.  I was amazed at the actual resort - gorgeous lobby and pool deck - and completely unprepared for the beach scene.  There was a huge noisy, non family-friendly crowd at the beach, zero beach chairs or beach service provided by the resort.  When I asked the front desk about the ‚Äúbeach situation,‚Äù I was assured that all I had to do was ask someone
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Studio at the Montage stands in quality presentation of its made to order menu dishes.The cuisine is cooked to order with subserb service and presentation is supplemented with their excellent cellar of wines. The fishe dishes are always fresh and seasoned with expertise and their rib eye and fillet mug on steaks leave you wanting mores most memorably and a desire to come back evening
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at Studio! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed both the quality of the food, as well as service. We look forward to welcoming you back to explore the menu even more! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Gorgeous views, great staff, mechanical issues
Summary: This hotel is spectacular.  Set on a bluff, you see crashing waves from ocean view rooms.  I hosted a small group of executives there and they loved the short walk to beach, pools, overall ambiance.  The walk to the room is a bit like a maze but well worth the views.  Not so pleasant was a lack of hot water one morning and cold shower, however the hotel did make amends for that.  It‚Äôs my understanding they will be doing some needed renovations.  Overall a great experience minus one cold shower!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Montage Laguna Beach. I apologize for the hot water issue and am happy to hear it was resolved by our team. You are correct, we are anticipating a rooms renovation later this year. I am happy to share that earlier this year we completed a Lobby and Lobby Lounge renovation and continue to reinvest in the property. We look forward to sharing the progress with our guests while continuing to offer a five-star experience. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager  Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: I wanted to spend a few days away from home with but not have to get on an airplane. Although I'd dined at The Montage many times, I'd never stayed.  Well, this was the best decision ever! My room was absolutely beautiful, the view was stunning, and the service of course was impeccable!  I had the opportunity to enjoy the beautiful spa! I loved the access to the outdoor pool that overlooked the Pacific Ocean.  Ahhh... complete relaxation! And of course, at the end of the day there was always a beautiful dinner to be had at The Studio! All of this is just the hotel.  There's beautiful Laguna to enjoy which itself has amazing dinning to offer.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for choosing Montage Laguna Beach as your staycation destination! I am delighted to hear you had such a lovely stay with us. It sounds like you were able to experience it all - the perfect staycation! We hope to welcome you back for a return visit in the near future.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager  Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Stunning resort sitting on the beach. A+1 on every level. Wonderful accommodation with two of the best restaurants in LA. Not to be missed. Sitting in an art inspired town with views & ambience second to none
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review here on TripAdvisor. We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to experience it all again soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Gorgeous but needs a few tweaks, just sayin.
Summary: My husband and I recently returned from the Montage. It was a lovely stay and we will likely return. The hotel is beautiful and set perfectly on a bluff in Laguna Beach. The views are stunning. The staff was friendly and the service was first rate.   Overall our stay was really great. And, like I said already, we will likely return and would recommend. There are some small things, however, that caused an eyebrow raise and are not really befitting a resort of this caliber.   The first thing was the coffee situation. There are Nespresso machines in the room to get you going with a first cup. But there is no complimentary coffee set up in the lobby. When I asked, I was directed to the barista at the coffee bar where I paid over $10 for a coffee (americano) with tip.  Ten dollars.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Is the hotel in trouble?  No more complementary coffee.
Summary: I have stayed in the Montage several times and it is wonderful. It is my first morning of this trip and I just learned that the hotel has discontinued complementary morning tea and coffee.  I live for a fresh hot cup of coffee in the morning.  I was told that for coffee I could use the little machine in the room and for tea ‚Äî oh well.  I‚Äôm not cheap but $9 for a tea bag and a half filled paper cup of hot water?  Plus, having to stand there and wait for someone to make it as opposed to just pouring it yourself . . ..  Why change hotel policy?  Most budget hotels have all you can drink free morning coffee and for a 5 Star hotel this is an embarrassment.  Montage explanation please?
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: New Idea for a Rip Off
Summary: This is our 6th visit to this property and it is as beautiful as ever.  But be aware that this property has done away with free carry out coffee in the morning and has started charging $7 for a cup of coffee!  I really don't care how nice the property is or how much a room costs for the night, $7 for a cup of coffee is a rip off to the point of being offensive.  So if you stay here and want to sit and have a cup of coffee in your room be prepared to pay $7 ($14 if there are two of you) or spend 20 minutes walking across the street to the supermarket and back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We went to the lobby lounge for refreshments, a bite to eat and the view.  Unfortunately, there were only pastries, which looked delicious but we didn‚Äôt feel went with cocktails. So the staff suggested the Loft, which was one level down.  The view was just as wonderful ‚Äî high up and overlooking the ocean.  Wonderful selection of sandwiches and appetizers.  The maple coated chicken wings were outstanding, as was the hummus and tzatziki with pita bread.  Great selection of wines, liquors and cocktails.  Maren was a great server.
Manager Response: Thank you for dining with us at The Loft. I appreciate the feedback and am delighted to hear you enjoyed your experience, including the spectacular views! We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Really nice hotel and great place to stay for a weekend getaway.  The hotel layout is a bit odd, but when we got lost and asked, one of the hotel staff was so kind as I walk me to my destination.  I was very impressed by the super friendly staff.  But we stayed over Mother‚Äôs Day weekend and it did get a bit crowded and service slipped somewhat.    Gorgeous views from the lobby.  There‚Äôs a main hotel pool, which was crowded with kids, so great for families but not so much if you want some peace and quiet.  There‚Äôs a pool by the spa but it‚Äôs only for people who use the spa services.  Disappointed that the hotel doesn‚Äôt reserve a separate pool area for adults only (e.g., Four Seasons in Hawaii).    We dined at The Loft and food was decent.  There‚Äôs a $50 corkage fee and because we
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest and for sharing your review here on TripAdvisor. The property layout seeks to maximize ocean views in each of the rooms, which can make navigation not as straight forward at times however I am happy to hear that a member of our team was able to assist. I appreciate all of your feedback and will share it with our teams. Thank you again for staying with us and we hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston General Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Be prepared to spend some cash!
Summary: Unreal views is for sure the best thing about this resort!  A little outdated but nice!  Nice facilities will find you.  I saw some people say $34 for a salad I didn't see that myself.  Now I did pay $294 for a deep tissue massage LOL!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your review and feedback here with us on TripAdvisor. I am happy to hear you had a pleasant stay overall. We have recently renovated our Lobby Lounge and will continue to make enhancements to the property and rooms throughout the year. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back to see what's new! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The hotel is elegant but with a laid back attitude where the people that work there are genuine.  The hotel is definitely higher price per night than most.  One thing that really stood out was that each employee, from the room service employees to bell boys would always move to the side anytime you walked by to allow you full access of the hallway.  It happened every time even if there was plenty of room for each of us to walk by.  The rooms are nicely decorated but not overly large.  They also had a a small deck that has 2 chairs and a little table so you can sit and enjoy your coffee and the view and listen to the waves crash.   The bathroom was very large and had a separate tub from the shower and 2 sinks.  The bed was super comfy and there was a little sofa sectional and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback of Montage Laguna Beach!  We pride ourselves on outstanding guest experience and I look forward to sharing your comments with my team. We are incredibly grateful for your business and look forward to welcoming you back to the beach soon! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The Montage Laguna Beach is one of the best hotels I have ever experienced. From the front desk clerk walking me to my room to the valet service always having my car ready, the Montage staff is the best I have experienced. The room overlooking the ocean was fantastic especially hearing the waves crash. The room service was fast and efficient. The dining at the restaurants was incredible. The bathroom had two sinks which is always great to have as well as a separate shower and bathtub.  The concierge provided excellent services for outings off the premises. If you have the chance to stay, please do.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this great feedback. Summary: Was a guest at this hotel for a conference and brought my family for a mini vacation. Didn‚Äôt know what to expect for our five and two year old, but it was one of the best family hotel experiences we have ever had. Every need and whim of my kids was met. Very friendly, helpful staff. Beautiful location. Wonderful experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest at Montage Laguna Beach. I look forward to sharing your review with them and we all look forward to welcoming you back to make more Montage memories.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The Montage is elegant, the food is delicious, the views are outstanding, the rooms tastefully appointed, the beds extremely comfortable and the staff all extremely friendly and helpful .... but it is enormous (hallways that go on and on and on) and the prices are a bit absurd. Even if cost were completely removed from the equation, there are other places in Laguna I much prefer staying.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest. We value and appreciate your feedback and do still hope to welcome you back to Montage Laguna Beach.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: We have stayed here more than a few times. The rooms are very nice; big, clean nice views. The service is top notch, never an issue, they go out of their way to help, etc.  The ocean views are excellent and the grounds are impeccable! The hotel is large and in a very nice spot above a beach so you have access to the beach if you get tired of the pool. Speak ing of pools, there two pool; family and spa. The family pool gets a little crazy so if you do not have kids you need to go to the spa pool. Only issue is last time we stayed here and went to the spa pool they changed $50 to use it for the day. In my opinion this is a bad move.  Its once thing saving the pool for spa guests, its a whole other thing charging to use a more quite pool.  Needless to say i hit the beach, which is
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest! I am delighted to hear of your positive experiences on property and with our associates. You're correct that the spa pool is reserved for spa guests - I apologize for any disappointment this has caused, however we look forward to welcoming you back again, hopefully soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: We had been debating staying here for a while and finally decided to splurge. Let me start by saying that you can not beat the location, it is gorgeous. Having said that you do not have to say here to enjoy the views. We saw tons of people just walking by the side of the hotel while sitting in our balcony which does not make it feel very private. The first disappointment we encountered was immediately walking into the hotel to find out the lobby was completely closed due to a current renovation. It would have been nice to know in advance about the lobby's closure so we could have planned accordingly, in our opinion this is one of the best features of the hotel. For the price we expected at least parking which was an additional $50 night to be included as well as turn down
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest. We appreciate your feedback and I am sorry to hear that elements of your stay did not meet your expectations. Thank you again for your valuable feedback and I hope that we have the opportunity to welcome you back for an improved visit in the future.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: It was a warm sunny day so we decided to splurge and have lunch at the loft at the Montage in Laguna Beach. It was so relaxing to sit on the patio and take in the view. We asked if they had a charcuterie plate as it was not on the lunch menu.  They put one together for us and it was the perfect thing to share. The servers were nice and attentive.  Valet was validated by the restaurant but the real topper as seeing whales swim by as we gazed out to the pacific.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for joining us at The Loft. I am happy to hear you felt the service was attentive and that our associates were able to deliver on your request. We have an amazing cheese program at The Loft and charcuterie also features of our evening menu  so we are delighted to be able to accommodate. See you soon! Summary Heading: The Good, the Bad, & the Ugly.
Summary: We stayed over Easter weekend 2018 and enjoyed our time, but there are some things that tarnished our overall experience.  in the end, finding an unauthorized charge for nearly $500 on my bank statement was the final nail in the coffin.  -CHECKING IN: We booked through the hotel, and requested a suite. We were told suites weren't available during our stay, so we ended up with a regular room with an ocean view. I contacted the front desk and spoke to the GM of Customer Service, who was very accommodating. Manager Response: Thank you for your review and providing thorough and valuable feedback. I appreciate you bringing these items to my attention and I have taken the opportunity to personally address all of these matters with our leadership and associates. Summary: On a cycle ride through Laguna Beach I stumbled upon The Montage which is apparently the ‚Äògrand dame‚Äô top hotel of the area.  I had lunch at the alfresco restaurant and it was nothing to write home about. I asked the waitress if I could please borrow some power and a portable charger was promised but never delivered.  When I enquired again they told me they had run out of chargers.  I‚Äôm not sure if they bothered checking and there
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of your recent visit - we truly appreciate the feedback. Summary Heading: Will always be my favorite Resort.
Summary: Love the montage. Has such a beach, homey feel but yet so classy & beautiful. Absolutely love this place. For drinks or dinner even. They have a full spa downstairs here, with all kinds of spa services. A few gift shops. Access to beach. Can‚Äôt wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest. We are delighted to be your favorite resort and look forward to welcoming you back! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Perfect Get Away for the weekend
Summary: My wife and I spent the weekend at the Montage in March 2018. The room had a perfect view of the ocean, the food was fantastic and the staff were attentive to our every need. Walks on the beach every afternoon were perfect for relieving stress. This is a wonderful, picturesque weekend getaway.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us at Montage Laguna Beach! I am delighted to hear you had a pleasant stay with us and were able to enjoy everything we have to offer. I appreciate your recognition of our associates and look forward to sharing your review with them. We hope to welcome you back soon! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager  Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: This is a five Star resort was a five-star hotel with a five-star restaurant: does it make the 15 rule? I would give this hotel five stars with the front office staff being fully wonderful and professional including the front staff who took us to a room to make sure it was adequate. Wonderful betting wonderful bathroom wonderful view. Our next experience was poolside which was a little bit interesting because we were ‚Äúafter hours‚Äù yet one of the staff was kind enough to bring us chips and guacamole, the downside of this was that we went swimming and the chips salsa and guacamole disappeared without explanation only half eaten even that was obvious all of our clothing and accoutrements we‚Äôre nearby. -0.5 stars. The concierge was wonderful to get us two seats at the high-end
