I am happy to hear that you were able to experience all Montage Laguna Beach has to offer and that you felt well taken care of by our associates. I look forward to sharing your kind words with the team and we all look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: We were there for a meeting. Our room was in a perfect location we were right on the ocean. No complaint there. This is above my budget for sure. Everything was outrageous price wise. I cannot bring myself to pay $34 for a salad. It is a beautiful location and we had a wonderful room. The stool area however had a urine smell and I did have to call for maid service one day as they failed to service our room and next day I had to call to have the tub cleaned.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest. I would like to apologize for the housekeeping issues and will be sure to bring this up with the team. We appreciate you sharing your feedback! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Brady Bunte- Montage Laguna Beach Review
Summary: I believe that the Montage Laguna Beach is the finest Hotel in the world. I am very well traveled and every time I visit this hotel I continue to be impressed.  The owner is hands on and this is his favorite of all the Montage Resorts, it makes it more special.  The rooms are perfect with bedding for a King & Queen!  The Studio restaurant is the best and they have a unparalleled extensive wine list. Make sure and visit David Alan Baker play his piano into the late hours in the lobby lounge. They also carry Tres Sietes Tequila which is the best tequila I have every tasted,   Make sure and visit the Montage Laguna Beach and tell them Brady Bunte sent you!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest, Brady! We are so happy to hear your experiences at Montage Laguna Beach continue to live up to expectation and we look forward to welcoming you back! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Had the best stay for a ladies birthday weekend!
Summary: Came to Montage to celebrate our friends birthday who had a baby recently and so we wanted to have a nice relaxing ladies weekend for her. It was absolutely perfect! We had the best stay, our room was not ready so they gave us a complimentary cabana by the pool. The food and drinks there were amazing! It‚Äôs a dog friendly hotel so I was able to bring my little yorkie and she had the best time! Our rooms were stunning! Right on the water. The facilities were amazing, from the pool to the grounds to the rooms. Everything was perfect and every view was amazing! I can‚Äôt say enough great things about this hotel! We will definitely be coming back and also staying at all the other Montage locations! Thank you for giving us one of the best stays at a hotel! Oh and the beds and robes are
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest, Jenny! I am delighted to hear that you and your friends (and Yorkie!) had a wonderful stay with us. We hope to welcome you back for another stay in the near future.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Loved spending time at The Montage! So convenient to downtown..walked to restaurants a couple of days, but also enjoyed lunches and some dinners at The Montage. The spa was amazing, best massage ever and was able to get a haircut too. Much attention paid to condition of hair. Enjoyed the amenities and spa outdoor pool, gave us some privacy. Nice walkway along the ocean view and easy access to beach for most enjoyable morning walks along the beach. Looking forward to returning and also to trying other Montage resorts.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us. I am happy to hear you were able to experience all the property has to offer and enjoyed your time with us. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: The hotel is a wonderful property with beautiful views from nearly every location and room.  unfortunately the lobby bar was under renovation and the noise in the lobby deafening at times.  We fortunately could not hear it from our room.  They wait staff at the Loft restaurant was slow and inattentive to people wanting morning coffee or a takeout as there isn‚Äôt a coffee service or quick serve bar to be found!  For a hotel in this price range it was a little disappointing. I would try it again someday but certainly not if it were at rack rates.  It is not worth that.
Manager Response: Dear Chandra, Thank your review and for staying with us. I would like to apologize that the Lobby renovation caused a disturbance during your visit and that you experienced other service delays. Although it was not in time for your visit, the Lobby Lounge renovation is now complete and includes the addition of a specialty coffee bar that also serves light breakfast items. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future to see our new update.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Mananger

Summary: We stayed at the Montage for 4 days in February 2018. At the time there were undergoing a reno to their lobby so we never did see the full lobby however it was a beautiful stay all the same. It's a sprawling resort with maze-like hallways that eventually get you to your destination. It took us several trips to our room to get the lefts, rights, and elevators correct. It was all worth it. We listened to the waves crashing on the beach all night long. The pool scene was perfect and the restaurant quite nice. We will definitely return to the Montage.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us. We have to agree, listening to the sounds of the crashing waves from your room is divine! Our lobby renovation will be complete in a few days - I am sorry you missed seeing it but we look forward to sharing the results with you upon your return. We look forward to welcoming you again soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely Top End Resort Hotel in Laguna
Summary: Stayed here for a corporate retreat for the first time. Beautifully situated in Dana Point just south of Laguna Beach, this is one of the nicer coastal resort hotels on the Pacific Coast. Views are tremendous, rooms are luxurious, and the food matches.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us. We hope to welcome you back soon - for business or pleasure!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: We stayed in a Suite.  It was excellent!  Lots of room, with a wonderful bed.  I enjoyed taking a bath with all the salts, soaps and amenities.  The candles left in the bath area were a nice touch. I turned the lights off, lite the candles and relaxed.  The robes are very soft.  With two porch/lanai seating off my family room and bedroom, it was hard to pick where to sit and read. We had breakfast outside one morning and had a delicious red wine from our mini bar to watch the sun set.  The food at the resort was innovative and delicious.  The staff friendly and helpful.  Loved the spa and the guided morning walk on the beach. Informative and fun. Great way to start the day!  I will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback with us! I am happy to hear you had a lovely stay and enjoyed all the resort has to offer. We hope to see you back again soon - for business or pleasure!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: From the moment you arrive the staff treat you with personalized attention.  They call you by name and walk you to your room.  The rooms are so comfortable! The bedding and linens are super soft. Small balcony with views of the pool and Pacific Ocean make you not want to leave the room.  The lobby is undergoing renovations right now.  Mosaic restaurant is out by the pool and is a great lunch spot.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being our guest! Also thank you for being understanding of our necessary Lobby Lounge enhancements - we hope to have the privilege of welcoming you back soon to see the results! (Lobby Lounge is scheduled to re-open February 24.)  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: Price was very high and rooms are rather run down.All of the staff was very nice except for one young lady who was probably a family member of the owner.  Breakfast was your usual lobby breakfast and the waffle makers are all broken, you will probably have go to the lobby for extra towels and wait your turn which can take a while. There is absolutely nothing to cook with in the kitchen or extra things needed for a weeklong stay so bring everything with you including dish soap. I will say that the view is spectacular and it was nice to walk on the beach in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for your review and feedback. We would welcome the opportunity to discuss your visit with you further, please view the private message I have sent.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: Returned to this hotel in January for four nights, and it's great to revisit a hotel that still manages to deliver as good an experience as it did when new. They still offer great service, food, spa and the best darned setting, plopped right on it's own beach. The setting is reminiscent of Hawaiian hotels that horseshoe around the view and beach. The grounds are expansive, so prepare to walk if you are lucky enough to secure a room on the south end of the property facing the water (inclusive of waves lulling you to sleep). The central building and surrounds are a continuous stream of people going from one activity to the next, so staying there means you're closer to the action. The people watching here is prime, and free. The hotel is furnished in a traditional, Ritz Carlton
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for being our guest! I appreciate your feedback and look forward to sharing your comments with the team. Our Lobby Lounge renovation will be complete at the end of February so you will have to come back to visit and let us know what you think! On behalf of all of our associates, we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: This hotel is amazing - stay here if you have a chance. The beachfront bungalows are particularly awesome and everything about this place is great. I have stayed here a few times and it never disappoints. Staff are all very helpful, rooms are great and decent fitness room with beautiful ocean views.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us! We look forward to welcoming you for another amazing stay soon.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: I have been here a number of times and it never disappoints. I was at a business meeting and the surroundings and service are excellent. We had a lovely room with a beautiful view. The restaurants on property are very good with friendly efficient service. The only negative right now is that they are renovating the lobby so this area is not available. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for staying with us! Hopefully your travels will bring you back for a visit again soon - for business or pleasure. Our Lobby Lounge will re-open at the end of February (just a few short weeks!) so please do come back and see us.  Sincerely, Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary Heading: One of my top 10 places in the world
Summary: Everyone should be fortunate enough to visit the Montage Laguna at least once.  It is heaven on earth and is ranked as one of my top 5 places ever (Maldives is in there so you get what I am saying).  The property is lovely, the views are perfection as are the grounds that they meticulously maintain.  The staff is always friendly and accommodating.  The pool is the most perfect temperature for year round swimming.  The gym is just awesome and the best part is the spin bike they put outside so you can work out and be in the sun.  All  of the machines face the pacific, it is incredible.  The grounds are perfect.  It is just a treat to be here.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words - we are delighted to have earned such a glowing review. Thank you for being a loyal guest and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future! Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: I ve been curious about this place since it opened.- I was disappointed. One of our rooms was not serviced before 2pm. The bathroom sink stopped up. There were obvious signs of water damage in the bathroom and the repairs to the trim along the floor were noticeably bad. The TV monitor was not much bigger than a computer screen.  The room was over $900.00 a night plus all the extras so for that kind of money I expect much better amenities. The one stand out was the service was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and sharing your thoughts with us. We appreciate your feedback and I am sorry to hear we fell short of your expectations. I am happy to share that over next year we are making a series of enhancements across the resort. We are currently renovating the Lobby Lounge and later this year we look forward to starting a rooms revitalization. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back to give us a second chance in the future.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: This property is gorgeous!  The staff are all top-notch.  It's the little extras.  They have this down to a fine art. Despite the ongoing renovations, we were not inconvenienced or disturbed during our stay. Seriously, just go.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for staying with us. I am happy to hear that you were not inconvenienced by the renovations we are making to our Lobby areas - we are confident you will love the results. The Lobby and Lobby Lounge renovations will be complete by late February, then later this year we will be revitalizing our rooms so you will have to come back and see us!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Mananger

Summary: The staff and team at the Montage is the finest group of hotel professionals I have ever encountered. I left valuables int he safe of our room and returned home. Upon realization of my error I called the hotel and their security department. Not only were they honest but they went above and beyond to make sure my valuables were returned most promptly. They are professional and above all else honest. They could have easily said they were not present in the safe and what could i really do about it. But they were more than honest. Honesty is a valuable resource today and they have it in spades.   It shows the quality of management down that they would do their best in my situation.   Their director of security Desmond Jones is a quality person and consummate professional.   So not
Manager Response: Dear Tony,  Thank you for your review and sharing your experience with us. I am happy to hear that your items were efficiently returned to you. Integrity and trust are part of our core values and I am delighted they came across in your experience. I will be sure to relay your praises to Desmond and our Security team. We hope to see you for a return visit soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: Spent a weekend recently and was dazzled by the spectacular setting on one of the most picturesque corner cliffs in California.  The Montage Laguna Beach has a grand presence; but yet, is so intimate that it seduces you to wanting to come back over and over.  It truly is a romantic place, perfect for any special occasion.  I‚Äôd be remiss not to mention some of the stars of this incredible place... Alexa at the front desk was just so warm and inviting; Allie at the spa greeted us with a perpetual smile; Arnulfo from The Loft was such a hard worker; and Jon the driver has a bright future in whatever he‚Äôll tackle.  A special mention to Chris Russell for his incredible leadership and management of his team.  It was obvious to see how much his team enjoyed working for him.  Overall,
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind words - we are all so humbled. We are grateful that you chose Montage Laguna Beach for your recent getaway and are delighted to read that our team made your visit even more memorable. I will be sure to share your review with each of them personally. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with us and hope to give you a warm welcome back soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: We used to live in Laguna Beach and brought our 12 yr old son back to see where he was born. Decided to splurge and stay at the Montage Resort as a treat over New Years. We had it built up in our heads that it was going to be so amazing and found our room tired, dirty and the worst shower ever! At those prices, there shouldn't be any black mildew/mold around the bath or floor tiles. They said they are going to be renovating hotel and we know why now. Service was EXCELLENT. Must mention that. The staff were excellent. We spent a lot of money to stay here for a special time and it turns out the next hotel on our trip - the one we were dreading - Sheraton Anaheim (Disneyland) - was cleaner and had a fantastic washroom/shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for letting us know of your disappointment with your recent stay. Your feedback is highly appreciated and if you can afford the time, we would like to discuss with you further when you have a moment. Please view the private message I have sent.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Mananger

Summary Heading: Beware the chain smoker next to your room
Summary: After many wonderful stays at The Montage since it opened in 2003, our last visit over Thanksgiving, 2017 was a huge disappointment. They no longer ban guests smoking on their balconies, and almost all rooms have balconies separated by a narrow divider. If you are as unlucky as we were to have a chain smoker next door, your desire for clean sea air will be ruined. I complained to the front desk, and they said nothing could be done about it. I can't believe The Montage allows this to happen. We will be looking elsewhere for our annual vacation to the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for being a loyal guest since our opening. We value and appreciate your feedback and are grateful for the opportunity to have spoken to you earlier this week. Thank you again for reaching out.  Respectfully,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: Montage Laguna is as strong as ever.  Rustic but comfortable rooms. Lobby lounge and pool areas are still amazing. Had a wonderful brunch at the loft, highly recommend along with sunset drinks outside. Service almost too good at times...but appreciate the effort!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share a review about your stay with us.  We are so pleased you enjoyed your time here and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: The best mainland resort in the U.S. when considering the setting, the accomodations, restaurant and spa. We have stayed in their ocean cottage suite during the past 2 years. Expensive but definitely worth it. They include every detail including a pillow with the initial of your last name on it. The setting by the ocean and it's walkway are beautiful. The grounds are immaculate. The food is outstanding with The studio being one of the outstanding restaurants in California.  You would love to spend 5-7  Days here
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us! We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and had positive experiences throughout the property.  We look forward to welcoming you back to Montage Laguna Beach, hopefully for a longer stay next time!   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: Old fashioned rooms, the whole hotel needs a serious facelift. The bathrooms aren't anywhere near today's standards, for example no removeable hand held shower head. The whole place is filthy, stains all over the carpets and walls throughout the hotel. The breakfast is a disappointment. There is no buffet, but you will find a couple of dry croissants which you would except to find at a low cost bakery or at a motel.  But the most disturbing fact was that upon arrival we were told that booking through a third party will prevent us from enjoying the same advantages as other customers who made their reservation directly through the hotel. We were given a terrible room even though we booked one with an ocean view, and when we complained about the room they changed us to a very
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for letting us know about your experience. I am truly sorry to hear about your experiences throughout the resort and would appreciate the opportunity to to reach out to you in hopes of recovering you as a guest. Please see the private message I have sent and thank you in advance for your time.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary Heading: Wanted to gush like the rest but...
Summary: Family of 4, kids 11 and 8. Stayed Dec 24 to 27.  It‚Äôs a weak 3 or even a 2 for us.  The property is beautiful, right on the beach, and our suite had direct views of the pool and the ocean just beyond.  The suite itself is comfortable, 1 bedroom, separate living room with an ok sofa bed, and 2 full baths (one with tub and shower, the other with only shower).  The property decor is traditional American with staff to match - pool side, front desk, valets and shuttle drivers all clean cut, wholesome, preppy and super well-mannered. It was all so neatly throwback-to-JFK-era-America, I wanted to deck myself out in Tommy Hilfiger and tuck into a gigantic slice of gluten free apple pie to soak it in.  Where this place fell short and gets dinged:   Exclusivity - lacking.  At this price
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your candid feedback about your recent stay with us. I want to apologize that several elements of your stay did not demonstrate the high standards we set for ourselves. These are not the experiences any of our guests should have and I am sorry we fell short. I would appreciate the opportunity to have a member of our Executive team reach out to you so we may personally apologize and hopefully recover you as a guest. Please see the private message I have sent.   Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: I rarely am motivated enough to write a review but I just spent 4 nights at the Montage over Xmas and I am overwhelmed and MUST write this review.  I have stayed in numerous 5-star properties but going forward, I will ONLY stay at a Montage property, where possible.  From check-in service, housekeeping, spa, dining, check-out - the SERVICE was impeccable, bar NONE, extremely efficient, courteous and....KIND.  Yes, KIND!!! At many 5-star properties I have stayed, the service was efficient but just nickel and diming to death with a lot of NO's accompanied by a fake smile (@encore I am looking at you).  Here, every request was met with an "absolutely" and genuine kindness to go the extra step.  The lap-pool is technically only for spa guests, but when I asked if my dad could swim
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for staying with us! I am so appreciative for the feedback and thrilled to hear that every element of your stay exceeded your expectations. This is what we aim for every day and I will be sure to relay your message with the entire Montage Laguna Beach team. Wishing you and your family a wonderful New Year and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: One of my favorite places! The ground to the resort are amazing! It is the best place to take a nice walk and it also has access to the beach! The gardens are beautiful! The hotel is beautiful with stunning views! The restaurants are a nice treat as well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review of Montage Laguna Beach! We appreciate your kind words and look forward to welcoming you back to the resort soon. Happy New Year!  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary: My husband and I love this exquisite resort. The views are breathtaking, staff is excellent and the resort grounds are very impressive. The spa is pristine, the pools are large and beautiful with great lounge chairs. We enjoy this resort very much and highly recommend it, The resort is absolute perfection!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review about your experience at our resort. We are so pleased you enjoyed all the property has to offer and hope to welcome you back in the near future. Thank you for choosing Montage Laguna Beach and I wish you and your family a wonderful New Year.  Sincerely,  Anne-Marie Houston Resort Manager

Summary Heading: Quick Get-away in Laguna at the Montage
Summary: This is my second time at the Montage Laguna.  I wanted 2 days to myself, and this is a great place to hide away and have everything you need to not leave the resort.  The pool is amazing... great service with ocean views.  I‚Äôm in my mid-30‚Äôs, and the hotel is family friendly with lots of children, but the layout is such that you can still have a peaceful experience.  Plus, you can walk right down to the beach where the hotel will set up chairs for you.    Extra: fire pit at night next to the main lawn!!   The rooms are lovely - each has an ocean view with balcony - sunset every night. And the bathrooms are huge and luxurious.   I spent a lot of time (and money) at the spa, which was amazing.  I‚Äôm being very transparent - it is very expensive - but the facilities and treatments
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for spending your well-deserved getaway with us here in Laguna Beach. It sounds like you had a wonderful stay and were able to enjoy all the resort had to offer. We look forward to welcoming you back next year!   Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: 2 night stay in 3rd floor room. Wonderful view and amenities. My third Montage property. Service, everywhere and by everyone was world class. Only ate at the loft, which provided great food. They are renovating their main lobby, so expect a little congestion at busy times around the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Greg,  Thank you for your review and for staying with us. I am happy to hear you felt well taken care of by our staff and enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you back to Montage Laguna Beach, and any of our other properties, very soon!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: We had a quick overnight "staycation" here in the offseason. Property is of course lovely as always with a superb professional staff that made the fact their lobby was being renovated no problem at all. We enjoyed our oceanview suite and a private dinner party at Studio dining which is a beautiful setting. The entire place was decked out for the holidays and we loved the way they light the palms. Room was elegant and well appointed but does show some wear from age including chipped paint but nothing too deterring. Still has a fresh clean feel and very spacious. Morning oceanview just takes your breath away!!
Manager Response: Dear Ray,   Thank you for your kind review and for choosing Montage Laguna Beach for your staycation. Sometimes you don't have to travel far to get away from it all! I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and enjoyed a meal at Studio. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back for your next staycation!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: This place is jaw dropping. Overlooking the sea front it has the feel of a hotel from yesteryear but is very modern too. Staff are very very helpful. Internet is good but forget about all that. It's a place that you can simply come and sit, relax and revitalise. I will definitely try to come back here someday.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review on Montage Laguna Beach! I am happy to hear you had a memorable and relaxing visit. Please come see us again soon!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary Heading: If you want to feel like a million bucks!
Summary: Tucked into the coastal cliffs, this hotel is exclusive and caters to the upper class with price and service that matches. My room had 2 balconies and overlooked beautiful grounds.  Business trip did not allow much site seeing, but the food was excellent, little touches in the room like Bose Mini Speakers, forget me not ribbons on often forgotten phone cords, guest bathrooms so people didn't see my mess of a shower when visiting - all thoughtful and well executed.  Probably time for a little TLC to the color scheme, but what was there is not worn, but phenomenal.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and kind words about your experience with us at Montage Laguna Beach. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future - for business or pleasure!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: Good hotel.  Great gym with overpriced spa. Room was nice but a little dated. Hotel location is removed from downtown with beach access and nice views. Pool service was spotty however the food and drinks were good.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review regarding your recent stay at Montage Laguna Beach. We appreciate your feedback and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back soon!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Montage is always a beautiful spot to enjoy! The views and ambiance are undeniably gorgeous and the food at Mosaic is always so yummy! The pool is always heated so regardless of the time of day or weather, it's really enjoyable to jump in to. They have a separate children's pool as well. The jacuzzi is a little frustrating to get to (and is really odd in general) as you have to leave the main pool area, but it's not really a deal breaker.  The Front Desk Agent we checked in with was a little rude, but thankfully we met a gentleman who's name I believe was Alex and he was wonderful. He even sent an amenity to our room to welcome us back to the property which we found to be very thoughtful. Normally, Montage is really wonderful about acknowledging special occasions, however I
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience during your recent stay with us. I am glad to hear that you a wonderful stay overall but am sorry to hear that certain elements of your stay did not meet your expectations. We would welcome the opportunity to discuss this with you further. Please view the private message I have sent.   Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: No doubt, the Montage is an incredible vacation and Laguna Beach does not disappoint on delivering an unsurpassable location to lounge on the shores of the Pacific Ocean! It is a five star property for good reason! The view from the lobby is unbeatable. The pool is incredible and the location is fabulous. That all said, the food was only average taste & expensive compared to other California-style establishments. The room was slightly dated and small compared to other Montage locations I have visited. One of three nights we were already settled in before turn down service arrived. And another night there were no chocolates with turn down service. Lastly the mini bar was never stocked during our four day stay. These are very non critical problems, nothing even really worth
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about your recent stay with us and for bringing these issues to our attention. We would appreciate the opportunity to discuss your experience further - please view the private message I have sent.   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: We have visited family vacation every summer season Beautiful and you can enjoy Laguna beach and sea front view. We walked seaside every morning and night to enjoy sunset.  there are several restaurants to eat food. just we did relax staying here.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Montage Laguna Beach.  We are thankful that you choose to spend precious time with your family here with us. It gives us great pleasure to be part of those memories and we look forward to welcoming you back next year to continue that tradition.   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary Heading: Gloriously, tasteful and luxurious retreat on the beach
Summary: This site was chosen as an annual professional retreat.  "How sweet the retreat!"  Perfect accommodations, luxurious with beautiful views, highlighted by personal attention from staff and management.  Some of the most personal attention I have known.  This is obviously the best place to stay in Laguna Beach!!  A great selection on venues for business gatherings along all encompassing the breathtaking view of the Pacific Ocean. Pricey but well worth it with enough Lamborghinis, Ferraris, and other exotic cars to shame a Formula One gathering.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience about your recent business trip with us. We have to agree, there really is no better place to do business at the beach! I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and felt well taken care of by our staff - we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back for either business or pleasure.   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: I enjoy walking the beautiful grounds, taking in the breathtaking views and having a glass of champagne on the balcony overlooking the sunset. The food is always great at the Studio and the service is impeccable.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review about your experiences with us. We are so pleased you enjoy our beautiful setting and the culinary offerings on property. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: From check in to check out this place was amazing. We came here for 4th of July with our kids and the Montage won us over from the start. The nice front desk person wheeled a red wagon over for my kids containing very nice stuffed animals. The kids had their pick and their new plush friends never left their side our entire stay. The property and location is gorgeous. The service impeccable. This is exactly what you would expect from a Montage and they delivered!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us and for choosing to spend your holiday weekend here at Montage Laguna Beach. It is wonderful to hear you enjoyed your stay and felt so well taken care of by our staff - that is our top priority every day! We look forward to having the privilege of welcoming you and your family back soon!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director montage Laguna Beach

Summary: I stayed here for business in October 2017.  The Montage Staff are great.  They are friendly, helpful and make guests feel special.  The rooms are large and well maintained.  I had an ocean view (I think most/all rooms do) with a balcony.  The bathroom was excellent:  large, separate bath, toilet room and large double vanity.  It was very quiet in the hotel - great for resting and relaxing.  The desk area was good with outlets and room to work.  The grounds are super well kept.  It's one of the most beautiful settings of any hotel with beautiful ocean views and sea cliffs
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review about your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your accommodations and felt well taken care of by our staff. Whether for business or pleasure, we hope to be able to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The setting, landscape and architecture of the Montage makes it one my favorite hotels in North America. Walk into and through the lobby and ingest the ocean view and scents in the first few minutes of your stay.  Gorgeous. Interior furnishings and carpet could use refreshing but it's still a five star experience. Service is usually outstanding.  Food at The Loft is inconsistent, but The Studio restaurant is excellent. We've dined there more than a dozen times & it never ever disappoints. Al Fresco lunches @ Mosaic Grille are always wonderful (food, setting & service).  You can't go wrong at this hotel. Very very pricey.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your review of Montage Laguna Beach. We have to agree - the ocean view takes our breath away every day! Thank you for your patronage to our restaurants and sharing your thoughts. I will be sure to pass it along to the staff. We look forward to seeing you again soon!   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director  Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Words are not enough to describe this hotel. This hotel has such incredible service that it is hard to list out all that they do. The other reviewers have described the amenities which are great but I am just going to list out some of the incidents which I encountered personally. When I drove up, the valet asked me for my name. By the time I got to the door (3 minutes later?), there was an attendance there to greet me by my name.   I was speaking with a few people in the hallway of our conference room. One of the conference attendee mentioned to another attendee's wife that she was not aware it was her birthday. It was apparently overheard by someone because within an hour later, someone brought her a little birthday cake. Are you serious? They also keep a database of your
Manager Response: Thank you for your gracious and kind review of your visit to Montage Laguna Beach. It gives us great pleasure to create personal and memorable moments for our guests - no matter if you are staying with us or just visiting. Thank you for sharing your experience and we hope to welcome you back soon.   Sincerely,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: My wife and I stayed at the Montage Laguna Beach. Firstly, the hotel has an amazing location in Laguna. Secondly, the hotel is wonderful with extremely high levels of service.   The facilities and room are fantastic. Very high specification with a high level of luxury. Waking up to the view of the ocean is very special.  The staff at the hotel are amazing. They all went out of their way to make sure our stay was great.  The hotel also had special touches. Baseball caps in the car when you checked out, book marks and sunglass cleaners.   This hotel is a definite place to visit.
Manager Response: Dear William,  Thank you for taking the time to share your review and experience with us. We agree that it's the little details and personalized service that make all of the difference - I will be sure to share your feedback with the team. We look forward to welcoming you back to Montage Laguna Beach soon!   Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: Stopped here for a drink on the patio Wow what a gorgeous hotel and view!  Will definitely stay here next visit to Laguna Beach.  Property and grounds are perfect.  Most romantic place to watch the gorgeous California sunset
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We look forward to welcoming you back for a visit and more sunsets soon!  Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: The view is phenomenal.  I ordered the salmon entree.  Shared the calamari which is exceptional.  For dessert I had the apple tart with vanilla ice cream.  Service was spot on.  Yes I will return.  Valet parking is complimentary when you dine at The Loft.
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us at The Loft and sharing your experience with us. You made some delicious choices and we look forward to welcoming you back soon to try more of the menu!  Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: This hotel's location is awesome. The staff aims to 100 percent please it's guests.  awesome. The views are extraordinary!   THE PATIO AREA IN THE LOBBY BEAUTIFUL. THE FURNITURE IN THE MAIN LOBBY IS GOOD BUT WOULD BE NICE TO UPDATE A BIT.   The rooms are very lovely and comfortable. Bathrooms have marble tile-floors too.  The food is expensive!!! $26 for burger and fries.  However. the service is over the top awesome. a very enjoyable stay. lobby manager (young lady in the bar area) awesome - servers awesome too.  Bellman awesome concierge awesome. loved it
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Montage Laguna Beach - we are happy to hear that your stay was an enjoyable one and that you felt well taken care of by our staff. Our guests are most certainly our top priority! We hope to give you a warm welcome back soon!   Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: Recently had an issue with a booking and the staff was very helpful and responsive. Great property. Highly recommend this hotel. Excellent location and amenities. Best hotel in the area. Best hotel staff I have ever dealt with by far.
Manager Response: I would like to thank you for sharing your experience with us. I am sorry to hear that you experienced a booking issue, however am happy to hear that our staff was helpful and attentive to your needs. We take great pride in our level of service and we appreciate that you chose to stay with us. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Regards,  Rick Riess  Managing Director

Summary: we go often either for stay-cations or just to dine at one of the restaurants. the food is consistently great, the service is professionally great and the people are always friendly and helpful. the doorman Dan , the bartender Mike or the pool servers all make you feel welcome and appreciated. There are other 5 star resorts nearby, but the Montage is the best of the best. you can't go wrong!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of your experiences with us. I am so happy to hear you feel well taken care of by our staff and I will be sure to relay your mentions to the team. We are honored to be your resort of choice for well deserved staycations or a visit for dinner and drinks. We look forward to seeing you again soon!   Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director Montage Laguna Beach

Summary: The best part of our stay was the location, beautiful non-crowded beach with umbrellas and chairs for guests. The spa was very nice, spa employees were exceptional. Definitely one of, if not the best massage I have ever had!  Now the rooms could be refreshed and the front desk clerks could be more friendly and helpful. They seemed put out when we asked for a map of the property as well as some local information on how to get into town. One night we ate at the hotel and servers were not attentive, meal was prepared wrong, burgers were raw, could not eat. Seems like a lot of local or frequent visitors receive the better service.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent experience at Montage Laguna Beach. We appreciate your feedback and will address the points of improvement with the appropriate departments. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: Montage Laguna Beach is an amazing destination. This was our second time at the resort and they did not disappoint. The setting is stunning, the rooms are luxurious and all have a beautiful view, the service is impeccable. We can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of Montage Laguna Beach. We are delighted to hear you had a wonderful experience during your recent stay with us. Making our guests happy is our goal and we look forward to welcoming you back to make more memories soon!  Regards,  Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: My girlfriend and I like to take a "staycation" to the Laguna Beach Montage from time to time. Every room in this resort has a scenic view and the staff is so helpful. My girlfriend got the best massage at the spa while I relaxed poolside.  The bar at the top has the BEST view of the coast and Erick is THE BEST BARTENDER in the county! Always so helpful and witty and pours the best chocolate margarita! The piano player is a hit too as he literally plays EVERY request from Tchaikovski to Taylor Swift!  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED A VISIT TO THE MONTAGE AND TO THE BAR!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share a review about your recent stay at Montage Laguna Beach. We are so pleased you enjoyed your time here and will be sure to share your mentions with Erick at Lobby Lounge and the rest of the staff. We look forward to welcoming you back for another staycation in the near future!  Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

We were there Sept 16-20, 2017.  Our daughter joined us on this trip soon after her surgery.   Lisa at the front desk gave us a room where we will be most comfortable and even sent a wonderful treat to make my daughter feel better.   Our last night at Montage, Susan at The Loft restaurant found our family a table with a view of the ocean even when we did not have a reservation; David, our server gave us extra desserts to make us feel better on our last night.   Everyone at Montage are wonderful and they are willing to go out of their way to make their guests feel at home.  Thank you so much!!

Summary Heading: When pictures don't do a location justice.
Summary: Thank is property is stunning!  The staff is outstanding.  It is a feast for the eyes and soul. It is comfortable and warm, not stuck up, but the Service could not be any finer. Our room was delightful, done in soft yellows, with a balcony and incredible views. The beach is gorgeous, and the water is cold.  The property has so much to offer.  Dining on site is expensive, but good

Our room was not going to be ready until past check out so we were upgraded to a beautiful suite that directly overlooked the ocean. We were able to spread out and enjoy the room as a family which made our vacation that much nicer. The kids loved PaintBox, the care providing team at Montage, and wanted to spend as much time with them as they did with us. Montage will be our go to resort in southern California.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind review and for continuing to be guests at our resort. We are so pleased you and your family were able to create special memories here and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Montage is a beautiful property - great location - and really well positioned with super easy beach access.  But, rather than rest on location and property quality, Montage goes over the top with service.   While visiting Labor Day Weekend (to our understanding - Montage's busiest weekend of the year), service levels were still unbelievable.  Noticeably unique is how all of the Montage staff stop in their tracks as they pass you - always going out of their way to ask how you are doing, and if there is anything they can do for you.  A

It was relaxing to park our car and arrange for theirs to take us back and forth into a town known for limited parking.

Summary: The Montage is a beautiful sprawling hotel built on a hill with access to the fantastic beach below.  It was very private and intimate with 250 rooms.  Immaculately maintained.  There were sidewalks that walked all along the back of the resort.  We had breakfast each morning in the Loft, lunch at the Mosaic Bar & Grille by the pool and enjoyed dinner one night at the Studio.  Everything was delicious!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share this review about your experience at our resort. We are so pleased you enjoyed the culinary offerings on property and hope to welcome you back in the near future.   Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: Been here three times over the last three years for several nights.  if you are not a millionaire or do not feel comfortable around wealthy people I don't know why you'd stay here.  Let's put it this way there are no bargains to be had. But for the people who frequent a place like the Montage money seems to be the least of their problems. The question is: is any resort hotel worth 4 figures and up per night? I honestly don't know.  Being blunt I am not a Montage person. I have worked hard my whole life to make money and save it and therefore not spend it frivolously. The Montage is for the uber-rich who don't think about what something is going to cost.  So why am I here? As a guest of someone else. If I had to pay for this myself my head would spin as you are paying for
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share an extensive review of your experience at Montage Laguna Beach. Summary: a gorgeous hotel and the best spa I have ever visited. Service is exemplary, the level I have rarely encountered before. Yes, it's expensive - and yes, the rooms and common areas could use an update - but the service is for sure you are getting what you pay for. Everyone that works there is beyond friendly and always looking for what they can do to help.  I had a back injury as we were arriving and one morning an employee saw me in the gym using a foam roller. She asked me if there was anything I needed and I just said that my back was killing me and I was trying to get some relief -- well by the time I walked out of the gym, she had some creams

Well, maybe it rivals what the Four Seasons used to be in the 80s or 90s, or some of the Amans in Asia. Point is: It was the EXCEPTIONAL service that made any deficiencies seem inconsequential. I submit:  Rooms: I had read (on TripAdvisor) that the rooms are very dated. I would say this is somewhat true. The furniture could be described as "traditional," so maybe that's why they don't feel the need to update it every few years. There were a number of occasions we requested drinks and they never arrived and that wasn't when they were busy! Breakfast is also incredibly slow. We were given a lovely room near a lawn however when my children were out playing I discovered it was littered with dog foul - it is a dog friendly hotel which is great but clearly some guests find themselves too important to pick up their mess. Weekends at the resort are like an American package holiday resort (albeit with bigger diamonds!) so be

Summary: The property is breathtaking, and views from various parts of the property are also breathtaking.  The main pool is the showstopper, and the lobby is situated perfectly so that it gives you the million dollar view that's in every photograph of the hotel.  The service -- from the front desk staff to the valets to the restaurant and housekeeping teams -- is terrific: everyone is friendly, courteous, and so helpful.  You're definitely made to feel welcomed and important.   As in other reviews here, the hotel does seem to be in need of an update: the furniture in the room and in the public spaces are showing their age with scratches and scuffs, for example, and considering the rates at the Montage, you expect a little bit more.  However, just get over it and enjoy everything else

The suite is incredibly spacious with two full baths (very important when traveling with 2 teenagers) and immaculate. Sitting on the balconies looking for dolphins is a simple pleasure. The service is above and beyond. The Montage pays incredible to detail to important matters such as food allergies and dietary restrictions. They do it with sincerity and with a smile. For example, the Resort at Pelican Hill the rooms are much larger.  The top feature of The  Montage is the location.  A beautiful location for sun, fun and enjoy a beautiful sunset dinner and/or wine with family or loved ones.

We enjoyed many meals and drinks by the pool, and the food was always excellent.  It's not easy to get food service right at a pool!  The food all around the resort was excellent, we did not have a bad meal!  The beautiful beach area is very accessible and the greatest part is they also offer excellent service at the beach.  Towels, cold waters, lounge chairs and umbrellas are all

Then that evening I was having drinks with some friends and the waitress said they only offer nuts and carmel corn to snack on in the Lobby, I requested something more healthy and she told me I would have to go to the loft if I wanted something else. Lastly, Spa

The customer service and staff training was exemplary...the best I've ever experienced. Our room was spacious, well-designed, with plush carpeting and all the amenities. We spent a lot of time in the spa and had massages which took the weekend to the next level of relaxation and luxury. Everyone must stay here at least once in a lifetime!

Every encounter from the restaurant, pool service, spa, valet, gym and front desk staff was extremely pleasant & courteous. It is so refreshing to have them reply "of course" instead of no problem. While the pool service is good, the dynamic around pool chairs needs to be addressed as you feel like you need to be up and out by the pool by 7AM at the latest for acceptable chairs (despite the pool attendant saying they clear unused chairs

Service was the slowest on the 4th of July, but the owner found enough help to set up a beautiful private party while pool bathrooms went uncleaned and pool food service was slower than a turtle. Nothing has been overlooked at this gracious home away from home.  All of this in the middle of July!  An impossible task for most hotels, believe me.  I've described the hotel in great detail in my last review, so I won't go into that again.  This hotel has gotten better with age, learned from its slight  errors over time and has perfected the art of hospitality.  I never give a 5 star rating

Life is too short to pass such a treat by.

Summary: Has to be one of the finest hotels, service and attention to detail there is in a5 star hotel.  They know who you are, they get to know very quickly what you might need. This is from the very first step out of your car till the time you leave. The best service anywhere!

We really enjoyed dining on property.  As others have noted, the food is expensive, but it is delicious and service outstanding.  We had such decadent breakfasts. We also enjoyed a very relaxing poolside lunch while the kids enjoyed a swim. There is a paved path that is an easy walk down to the beach.  It was January, so we didn't swim in the ocean, but had fun walking in the sand. We loved the fitness center

Bring your checkbook, since nothing is cheap, but it is worth it.

Was skeptical of the granola garnish but it was a perfect savory component balancing the natural sweetness of the ricotta. The Potato Soup was a meal in itself, generously garnished with bacon & chunks of potato, perfect, hearty winter soup.  The Short rib Carpaccio was excellent, garnished with shaved cabbage & simply dressed with olive oil & shaved Parmesan.   The bread basket should not be overlooked, house made carbohydrates well worth the calories.  Main courses included 2 fish entrees, both plates scraped
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of your recent experience at Montage Laguna Beach. We are thrilled that you enjoyed the culinary offerings at The Loft. The food in the restaurants is excellent, and there are many places to sit outside and enjoy the views and breezes. I really can't say enough about what a lovely place this was.

Staff is uniformly nice and attentive. Will exceed your expectations, which should be high.

AC wasn't working well first night but they were able to fix it the next day after I called them. I would suggest they check HVAC system before each guest just to make sure it's in working order  Room service was one of the best. Portions were giant. They had THE BEST gluten free

These are just a few examples of the attention to detail and great service. The cons - location wise, if you like walking to the nearby towns, it's pretty hard to do. You need a car or taxi to get to Laguna itself or surrounding towns. The hotel is also really expensive but that's to be expected in this area and for a 5 star hotel. Overall I highly recommend especially with young children!

I never had an empty glass of coffee or water, the staff was very attentive to my kids as well. My son was in

The price is comparable to the surf & sand, but that where the similarities end. If you are looking for a resort experience with great service, this is the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing a review of your recent experience at Montage Laguna Beach. We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay and felt well accommodated by our associates. We look forward to the opportunity of welcoming you back on your next trip to California.  Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary Heading: A beautiful Hotel with great Ocean Views.
Summary: There is nothing that isn't to be liked about the Montage. The rooms are great and the Scenery is the best. Yes, it is expensive, but a once a year stay is worth every dollar. The staff is great. Going to The Studio for dinner and even the Loft makes this a locale that you don't even have to leave.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was our first time staying at the Montage Laguna Beach.  What a beautiful place!  We had a room at the very south end of the property (we logged a lot of steps walking to and from it).  Our room had a beautiful view of the ocean and a nice balcony to sit on and enjoy our morning coffee (Nespresso coffee maker in our room) and take in the ocean breezes.  WE loved sleeping with our balcony door open to listening to the waves all night long.  The pool is gorgeous and the attendants around the pool were so friendly and accommodating.  It's not an inexpensive place to eat and drink.  Poolside margaritas are around $20 each.  Delicious though!  Order the chips and guacamole as they are a great bargain on the list.  Be patient in the valet queue, but they are very efficient.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us at Montage Laguna Beach and taking the time to share a review of your experience. We are thrilled that you felt well taken care of by our associates at the Mosaic Pool and enjoyed the culinary offerings. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon.  Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: I was excited to surprise my friend for her 70th birthday with lunch and a day of pampering at the Montage. When we arrived, the valet approached us to inform us that there was no parking available at the Montage because of a venue they were having. He directed us to a couple of parking lots down the street. We turned the car around to go look for parking. Found a place to a couple blocks away. Then we realized the distance was too far for my friend to walk with her bad hips. So, back to the Montage to drop my friend off, leave, go park the car,walk back. Wow, what a hassle! So disappointed, when were looking forward to a well needed, easy going carefree day. I hope they get their act together!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share a review of your experience at Montage Laguna Beach. We appreciate you choosing to celebrate this special occasion at our resort. We are disheartened to hear that elements of your arrival were difficult for you and your guest. Please view the private message I have sent. We look forward to the opportunity of speaking with you further.  Sincerely, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary Heading: Feels like your visiting your best friend - top service in the USA?
Summary: This is our 4th time staying at Montage Laguna and somehow it keeps getting better.  Just a quick intro on us... We usually stay at high luxury resorts (4S, Ritz, St. Regis).  We have a 6 year old daughter that makes our decision for luxury travel and family friendly a very tough find.  Let's just get to the stories on Service (cut to the chase because I could go on for days!)  Kids Club - They called the day before we came to say "hello" - Seriously?  They put up a sign in the room with the kids name and some catchy saying!  These counselors are the best in the business.  Since Lil' C has gone a few times the people remember her and give her hugs and she wants to go everyday (trust me not the case at other resorts).  Think of it as summer camp not a day care.  Service - They

Summary: Every room has a view of the ocean.  There was a mini bottle of cold sparkling wine waiting in the room.  The food and service in the dining room were very good.  I was there for a conference, and the staff was very helpful in finding my delivered items.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just spent the weekend at The Montage in Laguna Beach. It was a staycation since we only live a few minutes away. My favorite part of our stay was the evenings. We looked out into the ocean from our room balcony and saw a light shinning on the waves where the water brakes onto the rocks. In the afternoon we enjoyed sitting in the lobby bar area, where we had drinks while listening to soft piano playing in the back ground. Everyone in the spa area was great. They take the time to get to know you. When you book your trip with your Platinum American express card, You will get a $100 spa credit and meal discounts. We had such a great time. Can't wait for our next visit
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice hotel, although the rooms are slightly starting to show their age. We had breakfast, the food and service were good and the view is absolutely gorgeous. I have two concern about the Montage, it's very expensive and the staff asks too many questions to the point where it became annoying. How is your day going? Where are you going tonight? I felt as though I was in a deposition. Nice people but it was obvious the questions were superficial. I've found that the finer resorts I've stayed at the staff doesn't ask so many questions, good service just happens, it's seamless. I was always asked "is there anything else I can do for you?" to the point where it was ridiculous. When I asked for a wake up call I was asked this and I said sure please bring me a dove bar. Summary: We had family pictures taken today with Savannah at Pacific Dream Photography (located in Montage)   She was terrific, sweet and patient.  She made us all feel comfortable right from the start.  We had our 16, 13, 10, & 7 year old.  We took a variety of family, kid and individual shots.  We were able to see the edited pictures and a video hours after our photo shoot.  We couldn't be happier with the results.  Thanks for providing such a great service to your guests.

Summary: Stayed a second time at the Montage for a business meeting & was lucky to have a bungalow room again.  The resort is located along the coast overlooking the Pacific.  The setting is beautiful - the food is delicious -accommodations are very comfortable - staff is attentive.  The hotel is 5-star and at the same time very family friendly.  I have grown children so it would have been nice to have use of the spa pool without having to pay a spa day fee as was the case prior to the property being sold in 2015.  Overall, I always look forward to a visit to this property - it is a real treat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of the resort is breathtaking. The views, the weather and the location is close to perfect. The hotel is weak. The rooms are average and the service is poor. I booked via Amex Platinum and didn't receive an upgrade. Understandable. Many suites are "wide open" according to the front desk but okay. The ocean front room that I paid for is very nice. We spent a few hours (4 to be exact) at the pool and weren't offered a menu, a drink or even a glass of water. After giving us towels and accepting my $10 tip, we never saw an employee again. I helped 3 other women with kids set up their umbrellas because there was nobody to be found. The car service and the photographer were booked every time we tried to us them. I tried to call the concierge 5 times over a 3 day period
Manager Response: We appreciate you taking the time to share a review of your recent experience at Montage Laguna Beach. We are disheartened to hear that elements of your stay were disappointing. Summary: With colleagues. We went to see this lovely resort and have a drink. Wow is the word.  You get what you pay for is the phrase that applies. Complete with an amazing pool and beach access areas.

When I called to book I requested a top floor with a sunset view because of my husband's special Birthday.  The hotel granted my wish and gave us a terrific room at our rate level. We were treated so well even though it is a large facility...the way one is spoiled by smaller hotels/resorts. The entire staff from the front desk, restaurants, and down to the beach attendants went out of their way to accommodate our every request. Summary Heading: Felt as if it was our own private resort..!

The Montage staff really enjoy what they do, and that is making every guest feel pampered and special but not over bearing, just the right amount of appropriate attention.  When passing through Laguna we will make it a pin to stay...!  Well done folks, well done!

Summary: Where do I start in telling you about this disaster:   1. You have to pay $125 per person extra to use the adults pool (if you don't take a massage). This is after I've paid over $1,200 per night expecting the best for my honeymoon.   2. The valet is slow and inefficient.   3. The front desk asked how our stay was. I said "disappointing". There was no follow up question.   4. Avoid August if your a couple as its all kids!   5. The Bar tender doesn't know the difference between Basil and Mint. We asked for a Gin Basil with Lemon. We got Gin Mint and Lime.   You really need to check what Five Star means!

Summary Heading: Love this hotel, but I do have a gripe!
Summary: We stayed for two glorious nights near the end of May in an Ocean View Room.  We were on the second floor, so the terrace had a shading overhang, and we were content to spend hours just looking out to sea.  However, the truly magnificent property called us to walk it, so we wouldn't feel quite so guilty indulging ourselves at Studio one night, and at The Loft the other.  Many others have said true things, with which I concur, about the room appointments, the service, the overall quality of the property -- it cannot be praised too highly.   My gripe?  The $38 resort fee.  Seriously? Summary: We visited this property twice over a recent weekend as part of a wedding celebration. An outdoor welcoming cocktail party and then the outdoor ceremony and indoor reception in the grand ballroom. It is hard to find words to describe the level of service and sophistication that this hotel is able to provide. As an example, arriving early, we stopped in the lobby bar for a drink. My wife is a chardonnay drinker and she was offered 4 different wines to select...and given tastings of each. My gimlet was prepared (as I like it) with half fresh lime jiuce and half sweetened. This attention to detail is just an example of the level of service. We had a peak at some of the rooms and were quite impressed by the comfort. This resort is on our "to do" list for a certain return stay.

Summary: My family just spent four unforgettable nights at the Montage at Laguna Beach. Never have we seen a more beautiful setting. One feels as if he is on the Italian Riviera with the houses set in picturesque mountains, the azure sea underneath.  Every night we would walk to the resort's edge to see the most beautiful sunsets. Although it exhudes a relaxed vibe, the Montage is most definitely a true five star hotel. Every request is taken care of without question. Special orders at resort's restaurants are graciously honored with a smile, even at every meal.  We were especially impressed with Lace, our daily breakfast server. Her warmth, hard work, and enthusiasm will take her far.  We can't wait to return to the Montage. It was a slice of paradise.

Summary: I have stayed at this resort twice. Both visits were exceptional. You are greeted very warmly by the staff on your arrival. Beautiful views of the Pacific from the lobby and your room. Great service. Love the Molton Brown soap and shampoo they provide. Looking forward to my next stay in Sept. 2016. Cannot wait.

Summary: The Montage in Laguna Beach is a hotel of the highest standard.   The facilities, including pool and access to the (serviced) beach are superb.  The rooms are exceptionally well maintained and of a high standard.   The staff are simply excellent in their attitude and engagement, always willing to help.   We used the Montage tickets for the Pageant of the Masters, and while a bit more than the normal price, were perfect seats.   The hotel has two cadillac cars to drive guests into town and pick them up.   We would stay there again without hesitation.   The beach is Treasure Island Beach, and can have some pretty heavy waves so caution is advised.

Say hi to Little Nicky and his trainer - he's the resident Hawk to keep seagulls away. Restaurants and rooms are all exceptional as well. Great weekend getaway!

Summary: This is the third year I have been to this property. I have nothing negative at all to say. The accommodations, the spa, the food, the service and the staff are excellent. The hotel is beautiful, my room was perfect. I travel a lot and I have found nice hotels without enough drawer space or closet space and the bathrooms are small and in need of extra shelving for cosmetics. In this hotel I was very happy and could have stayed much longer. The spa is clean and modernized and the treatments they offer are wonderful. We spent July 4th there and the party we were invited to was wonderful.  I will return next year for sure.

Summary: This hotel/resort lives up to the hype. I'm not usually overly excited about the hotel I stay in. Yes, I want something clean and comfortable, but more than that, I want a place to sleep at the end of a long, fun-filled day. The Montage changed all that for me. This property spoils you. The rooms are beautiful, the pool, views and grounds tough to beat. It is far from affordable, but if you want to live the life of luxury in a beautiful city in Southern California, then this is the spot for you.

We found both times the service to be exceptional and kind.  The setting is probably the best vista on the entire west coast.  On one of our long walks we saw migrating whales - it was a special treat.  The Pacific slams against the coast and launches up rocks with giant sprays and foam receding back into the sea. This is a very special place that leaves lasting memories.

The spa, although VERY expensive ($400+ for a service!) provided three of the best services of our lives.  We utilized the fitness center each day and appreciated the array of fitness classes available to guests.    It was second to none - from start to finish.  Can't wait to go back!

Seriously, I have stayed in luxury properties all over the world and never been so insulted by petty nickel and diming...have some class and treat your guests like they're welcome.

The Montage staff was a pleasure to work with from the very beginning -- helpful, accommodating, and always personal.  Chef Strong and the entire staff at Studio executed a flawless cocktail and dining experience.  The suite was magnificent -- private, unobstructed ocean views, beautiful artwork, spacious interior, magnificent luxury.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful. The accommodations are exceptional, and include a fire pit where you can sit down with your wine and relax while listening to the waves crashing on the beach. Feel like a walk along the beach? It is mere steps away...amazing day and night. We enjoyed it all, including a late night hot tub & swim in the pool which is open all night. I had this beautiful pool all to myself two nights in a row, with music from the restaurant playing in the distance...I felt like a princess! Our room was in one of the bungalows...front row view of the ocean. Talk about atmosphere! There were even some bunnies running through the shrubs below our balcony.

Summary: This is an amazing property with casual elegance.  The service was outstanding and the grounds were immaculately maintained.  If you are looking for the sound of the waves from your room, this would not be a good choice; however, the ocean views in a beautiful setting are amazing.

Summary Heading: Ocean View Elagance, Perfection in Laguna Beach Ca
Summary: The Mantage sits on one of the most exquisite plateaux's on the west cost of Califirnia.  The hotel is sculpted for you pleasure maximizing its natural sea canvas.  The grounds are beautiful, views stunning.  Food and service are 5 Star, it feels like the home you desire.  Every view could be a painting, or award winning photo.  The Studio Grill is Michelin rated.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share an artful review of your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. Summary: Hotel was located in a great location.The views of the ocean from the hotel was just mind boggling.We really liked walking around the hotel.The room was nice and we spent a lot of time on the beach.The pool was the perfect temperature.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Chose a table by the window or outside on the patio.  Enjoy a delicious salad or sandwich. Arrive before 11am if you want a memorable breakfast complete with a basket of  sweet rolls and bread.  Impressive views that won't quit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Montage is lovely and the view is what this hotel is about. From the room to the gym, the view is beautiful. The gym was fantastic, the equipment was in working order and modern. Water and towels available with open floor to ceiling windows for fresh air. Room service was friendly and fast,the food was delicious and the portions were large. The pool area was quiet with plenty of chairs and towels available. The reason for the 4 stars is because too many people knocked on my door. I stopped counting after 4, all in one day. "Can I check your bar?", "Hello,I am here to ..." " Good afternoon,I am here to..." UHG! Too much! I finally put the door hanger "do not disturb" on the door and got some work done. Otherwise the customer service here is awesome and the staff is friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. We are so pleased that you took advantage of the resort amenities and felt warmly welcomed by our associates during your stay. We hope you will join us again in the future and we will look forward to welcoming you back.  Respectfully, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: We have just come back from a lovely stay at the Montage. I must say that the front desk is one of the best I've experienced. The girls working there made the stay very enjoyable. They gave both our boys cute stuffies when we checked in and the bell staff gave them hats when we left. I must say that it's the little things that make a hotel special. The property is stunning and you can't beat the location. The food in the restaurant was fabulous and the housekeeping was excellent. The only minor thing is that the concierge needs to brush up on their knowledge of Disneyland. We were using the hotel as a base for Disneyland and they didn't have much knowledge of it. I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. We are delighted to hear that you and your family had a memorable stay and felt warmly welcomed and well taken care of by our associates. Summary: I visited Laguna Beach last week for 3 days and had the most relaxed and wonderful time ever.  The Montage is an amazing place to stay from the property to the view to the rooms and the service.  5 star hotel all the way.  Highly recommend it if you ever get out to Laguna and hope to revisit someday.

The only negative comment that I would make is that there seemed to be a group of young, over served females in the lobby bar one evening recently.They behaved like they were out clubbing. This is not the type of place where I expect to see that. That was disappointing, as an after dinner drink would have been nice. Otherwise, a beautiful location to spend a long weekend.

Summary Heading: One of the nicest hotels I have ever stayed in
Summary: Service was amazing.  Everyone is nice and helpful.  No sighs, looks, lingering for tips.  Lobby/living room is GORGEOUS - view of water behind huge room filled with highest end furnishing and white orchids everywhere.  Rooms are just as beautiful.  Beds are incredibly comfortable.  Separate tub from shower with bath crystals provided and comfiest robe you'll ever try on compel you to take a bath even if you normally don't.  Balconies have view of the water.  3 high end papers provided complimentary.  Complimentary wi fi was great.  Fitness room has separate yoga studio; I was only one there so I did yoga with doors open to pool/beach.  Paths along beach are exquisite.  Beach access is terrific.  Food is fabulous.  Nothing negative to stay. Was there for 4 days.  Can't wait to
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. Summary: Beautiful setting but too many kids and events.  It is a very busy resort with weddings, conferences, and noisy kids.  It is very pricey for this lack of exclusivity.  There was also considerable noise with the gardeners.  The Studio Restaurant is a highlight with great food and also the live piano music is excellent.  There is too much commotion for my taste but maybe this does not bother some.   For almost 1K per night with parking taxes, etc. it is not worth it in my opinion.

We understand your disappointment as you were hoping to enjoy a quieter getaway. We do hope you will join us again in the future.  Respectfully, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: Stayed here for two nights. Great upgrade...massive thanks to the management team for that.  Furthermore the whole property cannot be faulted for fit finish and attentiveness of service.  Shame that theyre rammed full of convention attendees! Perhaps we should have become oncologists for the two days and we might have had more fun... The beach is amazing but how on earth can a couple wait close to an hour for a set of towels?  Also how on earth does the a/c of a new hotel sound like a wall unit from the 70s! All in all a bit like checking in to an airport hotel, albeit one with fluffy pillows and amazing views. On we go to Santa Barbara.   David Lempriere Arnold

Summary: Recently stayed at the Montage Laguna Beach. We arrived on Labor Day and the hotel was super busy. We were given a wonderful suite with a view of the ocean and side view of the pool. The room was very spacious and amenities were of nice quality. Beds were comfy and linens were high end. The day we arrived we could not find space at the pool and the special restaraunt Studio was closed. a little disappointing  but not a reason to blame anyone on a busy holiday weekend. The second day things improved. Plenty of space at the pool and no kids. we enjoyed lunch at the outside restaraunt, and drinks in the lobby which also had spectacular views and a fabulous piano player. The staff we encountered were all extremely pleasant. We enjoyed beach walks everyday and the location was close
