Summary: I spent three days here attending a work related conference. Upon check in I was informed that my room wasn't ready, it was about 2pm in the afternoon....I simply stated I was happy to wait and willing to wait longer for a nicer room, no hurry....five minutes later I was told a room was ready and what a room it was, 544...It had a fantastic view of the ocean and the hotel grounds. The balcony was wonderful and large enough to have a couple of people sitting in chairs enjoying coffee or a cocktail. The bed was comfortable and the shower had great pressure. the tub was big. The staff at the resort were amazingly friendly and always willing to help. have a drink at the bar on the 5th floor, the view was amazing.

Summary Heading: Amazing Sunset whilst sipping Cocktails a real holiday treat!
Summary: We were staying with our family in Laguna Beach and just decided one evening to visit the Montage for pre dinner cocktails.  The hotel is beautiful and the location is stunning.  We sat on one of the decks overlooking the hotel's beautiful pool and gardens and with a sea view.  The choice is first class, service impeccable and yes you do pay a premium for all of this, but worth every penny!

Summary: Amazing property, amazing staff, top 5 places to stay in South Orange County.    Though it is a high dollar spend, it is well worth it.  Every room has an ocean view room with waves lulling you you to sleep.  The honor bar has a complementary bottle of Piper-Heidsick champagne.  The room is perfect with all the amenities.  I highly recommend this property.

Summary: This resort is beautiful, great view and very comfortable rooms.  However, when you are spending @$3500 over two nights by nature you have to judge it against other experiences.  In this case, I think the Montage has some refining to do to get  their service up to par.  There is a pretentious vibe at the Montage, with the prices to make people feel like it's supported - I have to say Terrenea in Palos Verdes even beats this spot with service, locations and value.  Pros: -Gorgeous view -Nice room accommodations  -A real escape from LA -Wonderful spa treatment (tranquil dream) -Camille our pool/cabana server was really great -Live music in the piano bar was nice  -Kid Friendly, we didn't have our son but based on what we saw we both said maybe next time   Cons: -Restaurant service

If I'm at the beach I plan on relaxing in the sun, but this place certainly isn't "relaxing" ,,, the beach is about 2,000 steps down a steep cliff OR there are two pools ... the main pool jams the chairs in so tight you can't even walk between them AND you're lucky if you even get a chair. The cabanas are set way back with virtually no view.  The second "spa" pool was good enough, but not for me because they

Summary Heading: A wonderful surprise for a military member
Summary: Where to start, I am active duty military and the Montage welcomed us into their home through their wonderful charity called The Hearts of Montage. When I won the Patriot Appreciation award, the staff bent over backwards to make me feel appreciated for my volunteering in the community and military service.  Rick Riess, Chris Loidolt, and Chad Pohle were beyond thoughtful when planning this event. It also just happened to coincide with my anniversary, which they made into a memory that will last us a lifetime. Every single part of our stay seemed custom tailored to make us feel relaxed. We stayed in one of their ocean bungalow suites which allowed us to bring our dog with us. My wife was ecstatic that we got to share the special moment with our pet and he couldn't stop running
Manager Response: Richard, it was our honor and privilege to welcome you and your wife to Montage Laguna Beach in celebration of your anniversary. It was a small token of our gratitude for your remarkable service abroad and at home. You are an inspiration and a truly commendable recipient of our Patriot Appreciation award. Thank you for your tremendous service.  Respectfully, Rick Riess Managing Director

Summary: This is a very special spot...wonderful views and right on the ocean.  Great for families, couples, certain groups.  The food is excellent and service staff were welcoming...hope to go back!  The spa is not huge like some places in Las Vegas...just right for the number of guest rooms.  I would recommend walking on the beach and also enjoying the fire pit at night.

Summary: The Montage is nestled in its own cove in Laguna Beach, CA.  The hotel features 3 dining options; The Studio; fine dining with world class service, the LOFT; semi casual,  And the lobby lounge. The lobby lounge overlooks the Montage pool, hotel grounds, and the ocean. It is more relaxed, and able to accommodate groups quickly. The hotel has direct access to the beach. It is a small public beach. The hotel offers child care called "The Paintbox". Every child seemed to really enjoy it. The Montage is great for family get togethers, weddings, etc. it is away from the summer crowds in Newport (which teens like). The fitness center offers a variety of free classes, and is fully equipped.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Location and service can't be beat!
Summary: We rented a villa at the residences at Montage and had all the amenities of the resort available to us.  Aside from the outstanding location in Laguna Beach, the staff at the resort was exceptionally well trained and made our stay above and beyond wonderful.  We have a small dog and the Montage is extremely dog friendly - couldn't ask for more. The Studio restaurant was excellent (although a little over the top price wise ). The Loft also had excellent food, but at a more modest price point.   They have a wonderful kids program called Paintbox.  The spa was quite nice, and the gym more than served our needs.  There is no doubt that we will return next summer!

But the highlight is the location, right on the beach, with spectacular sunsets over the ocean.  This was our second stay, both times for business conferences that were expertly handled, and both with some time -- but not nearly enough -- to have some fun. Next time, hope to be back just for pleasure.

My only complaint is the prices of everything -- 25 dollars for a Margareta seems a bit steep, even for a hotel that caters to the well heeled like this one. To give you an idea of how nice it is,  Justin Bieber was staying there the same weekend we we're,  and I expect the Bieb only stays at the best.

They first told me that they were sold out (the resort doesn't even seem half full) and had no first floor available. Then they called and gave me a ADA complainant room with an adjoining room. The hotel is very kid and dog friendly (I love both!) but they aren't so conducive to a quiet, romantic stay.  Dogs howling in the middle of the night, tons of children playing football in the pool. If you are "star struck" you can often catch a glimpse or dine adjacent to the many Hollywood actors who escape to this small paradise.

We had booked a couples message at 1045 in the morning of our stay, and when we arrived, we checked in.  Our room wasn't ready yet, but we were upgraded to an ocean view room #472.  They took our bags and car, and off to the Spa we went.  The spa was beautiful, and had a sauna, steam room, plunge pool, and hot tub.  Our couples message was great, and I wish we had booked the longer massage

Summary Heading: Worth every penny! The bar has been set.

They cater to an upscale clientele but they are not at all snooty or stuffy. We were not by any means the upper crust of the people that stayed there, but every employee treated every guest this way.   The amenities are fantastic but let's be honest you pay the price for those things. And maybe you do pay to have great service but I've been to expensive hotels that fail in this area or it feels like people are being nice because you are paying for it.   Kudos to the management. I'm going to save up just to stay there again for a longer time.

The lesson to be learned here is not to visit during holiday season.

My stay at the Montage just made me realize how great a place it is.  The atmosphere, the view, a great staff that is attentive and genuinely cares and the Lobby area with the Piano and Steve Siu is a great plus that could spend days there alone just to relax. I hope to get back again next year sometime for a longer getaway as it unfortunately is on the opposite coast.

On the other hand, after staying here the place was beautiful and the service was spectacular- attentive but unobtrusive most of the time- though occasionally a little too fussy for my own taste.  It was a nice change of pace for me and while the prices are extremely high ($70 for two people to have lunch poolside with no alcohol), I have really never received service quite so attentive. The gym and fitness facilites were probably among the best I have ever encountered. The front of the gym was open air so you could exercise overlooking the ocean. A pool for laps only at the gym, plus a studio room offering free classes. The food was fabulous, service amazing, especially donw by the pool. I want to go back here as soon as possible.

The wine list was quite surprising, screaming eagle with mixes of Franciscan and Ridge.  I would definitely come back.

The Spa is beautiful and very relaxing. (any spa treatment gives you full use of the entire spa and pool for the entire day!) Each night a "gift" is placed on the night stand! Summary Heading: Great hotel and spa, food not up to par

The hotel, which is huge, is perched on the cliffs overlooking the Pacific Ocean (beach access is available) and has an exceptionally nice spa attached to it.  Service was excellent throughout; the room, while a bit plain, was fine and had a marble bathroom.  However, every single meal we ordered through room service or ate at the restaurant was either mediocre or actually bad, which we found astonishing in such an upscale hotel.  (Ironically, the food prices are unusually high as well).  This might make us reconsider returning; if not for this, we'd go back in a flash for the setting, service, and general beauty of the hotel and grounds.
Manager Response: I am disappointed that your visit to Montage Laguna Beach was anything less than perfect. After such a sterling review of our spectacular grounds and excellent service, it is certainly disconcerting that your meals were below par. We pride ourselves on creating fresh and delicious culinary dishes in each outlet of the resort. I only wish you could have enjoyed the memorable dining experience that we are known for. I will be sending you a private message with my contact information. I would like to discuss how we can redefine your experience in the future.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: we arrived for our 6 night stay from Australia after it came highly recommended. We were not disappointed. The facilities and service is out of this world. The view from the gym is priceless, the day spa magnificent, the staff amazingly helpful and friendly, and the room very very comfortable. Breakfast in the loft was fresh, healthy and tasty, with a view overlooking the mosaic pool and ocean. The service was prompt. Highly recommend the yoga on the beach. We found it very expensive, but worth it. Lots of iced water and fruit available through out the resort complimentary. We had such an amazing time we have already booked our flights to return next year.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Purpose built and totally fit for purpose.
Summary: As you would expect - a seamless arrival.  We were early ‚Äì no problem your room is ready .  Gorgeous space ‚Äì just the basic room I think ‚Äì with lovely ocean views, decent seating area, good sized bathroom but more importantly everything immaculate and clearly of the highest quality.   I think it has all been said ‚Äì this is an exemplary hotel with a brilliant location.  No issue paying for valet parking as they offer free private return transfers to the town centre in a Mercedes (I think) driven by a charming lady allowing us to enjoy some wine with our lunch and not deal with the horrendous parking. We ate dinner in the main restaurant as the fine dining option is closed on a Monday.  It would be hard to imagine the food could be much better.  I had a ravioli with ricotta, peas
Manager Response: none

Summary: At the last minute we decided to take a small Labor Day vacation and stay close to home.   We decided on the Montage Laguna Beach and loved it.   We were thrilled with the hotel and amazing service.   I can't think of a single complaint.   It is absolutely a high resort so expect high end prices.   We reserved a cabana for the entire weekend and were happy we did.   It was very nice having shade and knowing the cabana was always available.   The beach is beautiful and only a few steps away.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Montage Laguna Beach is our city‚Äôs highest end resort; it‚Äôs also ranked as one of the Top 10 resorts in the world. While it definitely caters to international travelers (some stay for 1-3 months at a time), the Montage Resort does a really wonderful job inviting local residents in, ensuring we all feel welcome.   Having seen it evolve its way along, from Laguna Beach‚Äôs original Treasure Island Trailer Park to this multi-billion dollar resort, it might be difficult to fathom WHY the Montage ranks at this pristine level ‚Ä¶ and that‚Äôs why I chose to explore it over a weekend as its guest.  I‚Äôll just do a couple vignettes on the Montage Resort here. I‚Äôm starting with the Montage grounds.   As you know by now, I‚Äôm pretty well sold-down-the-river on Laguna Beach‚Äôs beauty.  There
Manager Response: none

Summary: The whole experience was great. The service was helpful, the rooms were beautiful and well kept and the food was delicious. The hotel does get crowded but that was our only complaint. We highly recommend it and would go back.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay here once a year with some friends that come to visit. The view of the Pacific Ocean is fabulous!  Everything about this Hotel is great.  They also do a great job of setting up for you on the Beach and have a small Snack Bar.  Enjoyed Breakfast at the Hotel but I will admit...the meals are pricey for what you get!!  There are other great Restaurants close by to enjoy.  The Cocktail Lounge is small but enjoyable.  The only complaint I have is this...we were put in a room overlooking some new construction...when I went on the Balcony in the AM to enjoy my coffee I was greeted with loud hammering noise. We asked to be moved.  The Manager moved us to a room right above the Main Hotel A/C System...it was horribly noisy.  I don't know which one was worse.  I wrote a letter to the
Manager Response: I am delighted that you enjoyed another memorable summer vacation at Montage Laguna Beach. Thank you for joining us once again. I appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. We truly value any and all feedback as we constantly strive to improve. I am disappointed that your relaxing stay was interrupted by noise disturbances. However, I am grateful that we will have an opportunity to welcome you back. We hope to continually refine your experience with us.  Please do not hesitate to contact me again if there is anything I may do to assist you.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: The hotel and the grounds are absolutely beautiful.  The service was great as well.  We ate at the restaurant in the main hotel area.  The food was great and again the service was good.  The pool area is also very nice and the service is really what sets it apart from other hotels.  It was a nice treat to have the lounge chairs set-up with towels, fruit and water available.  The only negative I can think of is that it is a smaller hotel (in terms of the number of rooms), so the valet area is small.  There were a couple events going on so there were a lot of people coming in and out.  The small driveway lead to a long line of cars coming in.  The valet attendants were working quick to move the line though.  We requested a late check-out but the best they could do was an extra 30
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: noisy family resort, not for honeymooners
Summary: Coming straight from the Four Seasons Hotel in Beverly Hills, which we couldn't fault, we were very excited for the final leg of our honeymoon- a week in the Montage at Laguna Beach. We were told by everyone we met that we were in for a real treat here. I won't lie, the hotel is magnificent and the grounds and view incredible, but there was a real issue that i have to say, really tainted my experience.   On our first day i went down to the pool with my book, hoping to have a few hours of rest and relaxation....and that wasn't the case. Instantly, noisy teenagers and kids started throwing balls and screaming in the pool, only to be outdone by their even noisier parents. I'm a real family person, but this is certainly not what i had in mind for our 5 star honeymoon at THE most
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for the challenges you encountered while at the pool. We strive to make the resort a quiet and relaxing environment, and certainly pride ourselves on being an excellent honeymoon location. I only wish you could have enjoyed a more comfortable visit. I am disappointed that our staff did not go greater lengths to refine your experience. I can imagine your disappointment, and even more so considering what a special occasion you were celebrating. I certainly hope that we can make this up to you. I will send you a private message with my contact information. Please reach out to me so we can discuss these issues further. I will look forward to hearing from you.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: The resort is beautiful. The rooms, while small are top notch.  The service was flawless and I loved the in room check in.  The free sit down breakfast was also a great perk.  A 5 star property in every way.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Helpful hotel staff, nice amenities; rooms far from ocean and inattentive valet
Summary: Stayed here for one night in July.  Liked the helpful staff, there to greet you upon arrival and walk you to your room.  I needed a room change and she was able to do it on the fly, to a better room that overlooked the ocean (in the distance) and had a private balcony.  If you listened really carefully, you could hear the waves.  But you had to listen really carefully...  Bathroom amenities were excellent (really cool bumpy soap!).  Only bummer was leaving the grounds and having a valet seem much, much too friendly on the way out...only to drive a couple of miles and have the battery light come on in the car (which was housed overnight and clearly they left the lights on or a door open or something).  Wish the valets had been more straightforward with their error, rather than
Manager Response: I am pleased that our Guest Reception team treated you so graciously and that you enjoyed your room. I only wish your entire stay had been seamless. I am disappointed that you encountered an issue with Valet and found your battery was drained. Montage prides itself on delivering highly personalized service with a great amount of integrity. I assure you, this issue was certainly against our standards. We would be grateful to make amends and have the opportunity to welcome you back. I will send you a private message with my contact information. Please reach out to me if there is anything I may do to assist you.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: Stayed for 3 days in early august. Great hotel. Service very good both in lobby and at pool. Food is very very good - possibly best of any hotel I've been to.  Overall, best hotel I've stayed at in California.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had booked the bungalow suite, top floor, closest to the ocean. When I called to confirm this particular bungalow, I was told that the previous reservationist had not entered the special requests into the computer and now that bungalow was no longer available on the dates requested. So, I revised our vacation dates in order to get the desired accomodations and made sure that the second reservationist made these notes in the computer. Well, we get there, go to the rooms, and guess what- we don't have the rooms we requested.  In fact, we are in the bungalows furthest from the ocean, overlooking the noisy hot tub that is open 24 hours, we were not on the top floor, and we were in a handicapped room that had NO bathtub- i have young children that ONLY take baths.  Wow!  When I
Manager Response: I can imagine your disappointment upon not receiving the rooms you had requested. I truly regret our team did not go greater lengths to accommodate you. I can imagine your frustration, and even more so considering you planned so far in advance.  I am grateful that your experience in our restaurants more closely matched our Montage standard. Thank you for your compliments. I understand our Director of Rooms has already reached out to you regarding the issue with your room and you have agreed on a resolution. I will send you a private message with my contact information. Please feel free to contact me if you would like to further discuss your experience.    Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: We have stayed at the Montage nearly every Christmas and an occasional summer for 6 years.  The location is superb -- on cliffs above the coast, with beautiful gardens descending the incline.  A stairway gives access to the wild Pacific, including a quiet beach.  Our teenagers love this hotel as well.  Every room faces the water.  The pool is the most beautiful in the country. Several different restaurants allow for a variety of eating experiences.  The servers are great.  The only downside is the extreme expense of the spa.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great option for work or play
Summary: Second time at this hotel for a meeting and still found it to be the best hotel in So. California.  Service is outstanding, rooms are well appointed, bathrooms spacious (love the new robes), food is wonderful, location is ideal and the best is the amazing ocean front views throughout the hotel.   The Studio restaurant is very pricey but you get what you pay for and they have excellent wine selectons.    Easy beach access, great for long walks on the shore.  Meeting rooms have everything you need but it's the only area that you don't get the ocean views, too bad.  Hotel is a nice 45 minute walk into downtown Laguna Beach.  Downside, parking is expensive.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do *NOT* sit inside the Loft Restaurant @ Montage
Summary: I would *NOT* recommend the Loft Restaurant inside. Instead, sit _outside_. They crowd you into a room with little light and a very small window. The view from this room is lackluster compared to the view from the balcony. Instead, choose to reserve an _outside_ seat.  [Pros] + Great service.  + Great for groups.  [Cons] - Poor scenic view from the indoor loft restaurant location.  - Pricey -- not a great deal for the $$$, unless you are wealthy. $1200 minimum to reserve the indoor room. With taxes/fees/gratuity, this comes out to be ~$1500.  - $25 "wine corkage fee", PER BOTTLE, when you bring your own...really? If you bring in four bottles of your own wine, they charge you $100 for seemingly no reason. Perhaps this is useful if you have a $500 bottle of wine, but not if the
Manager Response: I understand that our Catering Manager has followed up with you regarding your most recent experience at The Loft. Thank you for joining us. I am pleased that you and your family received great service. I only wish your experience had been flawless, in accordance with our Montage standard. I regret that you did not have a better understanding of our policies prior to your arrival, and as a result your visit was less than perfect. I am disappointed that you did not prefer your seating arrangements and hope to better accommodate you in the future. I will send you a private message with my contact information. Please feel free to reach out to me if you would like to further discuss your experience.

Summary: Outstanding location in Laguna Beach, spectacular views---pool and beach are the best.  It reminded me of Hawaii--only much closer and easier to get to! Stayed in a 2 bedroom suite with our children ages 21, 17, and 11. The room had a small refrigerator and microwave, toaster and coffee maker--just enough to have a snack or light breakfast in the room. There were decks off the living room and bedrooms, great to watch a sunset from. Service was first -rate, from housekeeping to the pool, to the beach! Food at the pool was wonderful but pricey.  We would definitely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the third visit for our family to the Montage in Laguna Beach.  Each time we have stayed here the staff have gone WAY above and beyond.  They have treated my two young children like royalty....a stuffed animal (or 3) upon arrival.....cotton candy delivered to our room after a casual comment from my child to a man in valet...unbelievable!!!  Very upscale and private for adults yet extremely family friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, very good service, great for kids but tiny Porte cochere
Summary: Very nice resort. Beautifully appointed and designed, but beachy and confortfortable too.  Their Porte cochere is too tiny for the resort so if they are full, it's a real traffic jan to get your car from valet or drop off. We stayed in a suite or bungalow with an adjoining room for our daughter who is four. Very comfortable and nice room amenities. Only complaint was we were on the first floor and you could really heAr the ppl above walking around upstairs and stuff, so ask for the top floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Best.  No other way to Describe it.  The Best!
Summary: The Montage is the perfect place.  You get Top level service - Four Seasons quality - but with a personality :-)  The food is great - world class.  Plus, there is no more kid friendly place in the world that at the same time, doesn't make a person without kids go crazy.  The entire staff is fantastic.  We have been going monthly for almost 5 years and can't imagine not having The Montage in our life.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Montage is a wonderful resort -- great ocean views from pretty much anywhere on the property, wonderful staff, luxurious rooms, excellent food.  The rooms are so comfortable you won't want to pack your bag to go home.  The bed is like sleeping in a wonderful cloud.  The giant tub is perfect for soaking with a nice glass of wine.  Even the soap is wonderful -- I buy extra bars at the gift shop to take home with me!  Even if you don't stay at the resort, drop in for a cocktail at sunset -- a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Montage is a gorgeous resort & we are lucky to live locally so we can enjoy the spa and restaurants on a regular basis. For my 30th birthday, my husband surprised me with a stay at the Montage, and it was perfect! You feel like you are on vacation the second you step through the doors of this splendid resort. Room service breakfast was fabulous, the gift shop always has cute dresses and shoes, the Loft menu is amazing, and the spa is a slice of heaven. Come, stay, and enjoy five star service and amenities. Love, love, love this place!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our incentive trip planning company took a group to the Montage in June and had a great stay.  Nothing but raves from our group.  Great food, impeccable service, sparkling grounds.  Only possible complaint would be the food costs...$7 for a cup of coffee!!!  We expect 5 star properties to be expensive but the food costs are a bit out of hand.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I scoffed at a trip to Orange County.  Oh, I was wrong.  This place was lovely, perfect service, great everything. Think the food is a stupid expensive, but what you going to do. My brother was so psyched he could leave the kids with the hotel sitter service and drink by the pool.   A place that is nice as it's rep.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautiful rooms, on a bluff, but easy walk down to a swimmable beach, lovely pool.  Family- and dog-friendly.  Best Tub Award- thanks for the candles and champagne! Relaxing lobby with lovely view. Right on the route for the free trolley into town. We were sent here from the St. Regis when they had a miscommunication with Travelocity about our reservation. St. Regis paid for our stay at the Montage- and says we'll get our St. Regis deposit back.  How classy is that?  Kudos to the St. Regis!  But we'll have to stay at a St. Regis elsewhere, because we loved the Montage.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Amazing - I'm counting the days until I am able to return!
Summary: I just spent the 4th of July Holiday at the Montage Laguna Beach. It was one of the most amazing places I've been (and I've had the good fortune of vacationing at a lot of resorts.)    While it was rather crowded .... it was the July 4th Holiday ... and it's been my experience that most great hotels are filled with families and children over this American Holiday.  Even with the large number of guests - the hotel staff did not miss a beat.  They were attentive, hospitable, gracious - they went above and beyond at every turn.  My friend and I both noted that it was the best staff we've ever seen.    The grounds of the hotel are beautiful.  The access to complimentary fitness classes, including "Beach Bootcamp" was also a big plus.  The complimentary car to take us to and from
Manager Response: none

Pool chair set ups begin at 5:30 AM, and by late morning there was a waiting list for a seat around the pool.  The prime chairs are reserved for the people from the Montage residences, and are held for them if they show up or not.  The beach is also a public beach, and was equally as hard to get a chair and umbrella. We did complain to the front desk and to the concierge about this, and were told it isn't supposed to be that way, but nothing changed. Maybe they should leave the front desk and check out what is going on at other parts of the resort.  At one point we returned to our room at 3:30 in the afternoon to find that it had yet to be cleaned.  One day
Manager Response: I would like to apologize for the issues you encountered during your stay at Montage Laguna Beach. I regret that your requests were not better accommodated and as a result your visit was less than perfect. We are humbled by your feedback. Summary: After getting married, my wife and I stayed at the Montage in Laguna Beach. It was incredible. I have been there before for food and drinks, but this time we spent the night. The service was awesome and the room was impeccable. There was an ocean view and beautiful. When we went to check in, after telling them my name we were whisked away to our room where we signed the registration and gave her my cc information. Very private registration.   The next mooring we grabbed some coffee and sat out by the pool. The lounge chairs at the end faced the beach. Very relaxing and private.   I have stayed at many high end resorts and this one by far is one of the very very best. The attention to detail and service is 6 star.

Summary: Best hotel I have ever stayed. Amazing evening turn down. Great pool, amazing grounds, and coastal shore line. Loved Laguna, and would defintely return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is absolutely remarkable. We've stayed here 3 times - the first being when they first opened. The room itself is absolutely gorgeous with every amenity you can think of (even a throw on the couch). If you have an Ocean View, it's breathtaking. However, do pay the upgrade amount NOT to stay on the non-ocean view. It's just not worth staying here if you can't watch the ocean and pool from your balcony. The restaurants are all excellent as is the spa. There is no way you can go wrong with a booking at this hotel. The only drawback is that it's terribly expensive. So make sure you're in a good move to really enjoy it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Such a glowing review is a rarity for me -- but with regards to the Montage LB it was well deserved. The Montage Laguna Beach was an absolute pleasure in every sense of the word. Staff is the best we have encountered at a five star resort - warm, friendly and very helpful/considerate. The rest of our experience starting with the wonderful suite and its ¬†superb linens and ultra comfortable bed were just the begining. We are world travelers and regularly stay at top hotels around the world and never have we encountered such a kid-friendly atmosphere. The plush toys at check-in, the paintbox program, and heated kids pool, were just some of the highlights for our 2 and 4 yr old boys. The property is spectacular and exceeded all our expecations -- it was meticuously maintained, with
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our return to the Montage did not disappoint. All rooms and villas face the beautiful Pacific and its relaxed architecture takes full advantage of it. The property was full with families, wedding guests and couples all relaxing poolside or beachside.The lobby is one of the most inviting we ever seen. Expect to linger for a drink or two. The staff to guest ratio is incredible and will take care of your every need. We can't wait to return but do expect to pay for the experience...$30 per night parking and rooms in the $800 range.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A wonderful experience through and through ... but you will pay for it
Summary: The montage is gorgeous.  A pristine piece of property and a beautifully well kept resort.  The folks who work there are as nice as any resort employees I've ever seen .... genuine smiles and genuine assistance.  The views are breathtaking and not just outside the windows .... inside the resort as well.  You will have a wonderful time here no doubt.  But on to a few other things that must be pointed out: 1) They have a very stupid rules that ALL the chair surrounding the lap swimming pool beside the fitness center are reserved for Spa guests.  If you'd like to swim laps without a spa reservation you can but you can't sit in the chairs.  That's just dumb.  Set aside one quarter of the chairs or something for spa guests just like how some of the chairs at the main pool are set
Manager Response: We were pleased to have you and your wife stay with us at Montage Laguna Beach. Thank you for your feedback. Summary Heading: Many amazing stays and our dream wedding
Summary: We had our dream wedding here april 30th 2011. Service was amazing, views breathtaking, food amazing. Lucky for us perfect weather throughout the weekend.  Rooms as very homey, luxurious, classic.  Every guest was so happy with their experience.   I have stayed here multiple times before the wedding and can say thy this has always been the case.  The one problem I had was that there used to be swarms of flies in the lobby--- pretty terrible first impression. Luckily they were gone by our wedding weekend.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful Hotel with Spectacular Ocean Views
Summary: The rooms, pool, views  and service was over the top!  Short walk down the stairs to the beach.  Food and service was wonderful.  This is a Five Star Hotel is there ever was one!!!  Far superior to the Ritz down the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location of this hotel is absolutely gorgeous. The views are breathtaking. We "dolphin watched" from our balcony and the beach, right in front of the hotel, which seemed almost private. The ocean is lit up at night for a show that only nature can provide. There is entertainment ranging from elegant dining to roasting marshmallows in your robe, and evverything in between. The offer EVERY amenity you could possibly think of and make you feel at home at this lovely resort. That being said; the front desk staff was a little either snotty or not well trained (hard to tell which) both upon check in and check out. Luckily, the management made up for that with the gracious hospitality - so we will return in spite of the front desk clerks attitudes due to the magnificence of all else

Summary Heading: Incredible views only surpassed by service!
Summary: I have had the privilege of staying at some incredible hotels around the world, but have never experienced the level of personal service we experienced at the Montage Laguna Beach.  It seemed every member of the staff knew my wife and I by name, and they would successfully anticipate your every need.  Truly one pleasant surprise after another!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Gorgeous resort, but a little bit nickle- and dimey.
Summary: We stayed for two nights at this absolutely glorious spot.  The highs -- it is beautiful and well-located for exploring the area.  Particularly nice stretch of beach.  The grounds are spectacular.  It is like a botanical garden and full of hummingbirds and butterflies.  My 9-year old had a great time running around the property, and my 14-year old took his digital camera around and had so much fun.  The lows -- eating on sight is extremely expensive.  The more casual restaurant was closed both nights -- once because of wind and once for a private engagement.  That left the middle-tier and high-end restaurants.  We chose the former, and the waiter did not tell us about the availability of a child's menu for the kids.  I ended up spending about $30 per child for a dinner entree.
Manager Response: I am so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us at Montage Laguna Beach. It sounds like our resort was the perfect backdrop for your family vacation. We do have children‚Äôs menus available in each of our restaurants and I am sorry for the miscommunication. We strive for each of our guests to leave feeling satisfied and content. I would look forward to discussing how your next visit could be improved. In addition to this response I will send you a private message with my contact information. I will look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: Fantastic vistas, it's everything Laguna could be.  Last time we came to southern California we stayed at the Ritz Carlton Marina del Rey--very nice but this was much better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Words cannot describe how breathtaking the resort and grounds are.  We have already come back to the montage for the second time this year and are already eager to book our next stay.  From the moment you pull up to the hotel you know this is going to be someplace special.  Within minutes of our arrival a resort concierge greeted us outside with a wagon filled with toys for our kids.....need I say more.  Our room was a suite on the second floor overlooking the pool/ocean which was breathtaking beyond belief.  We rented a cabana for the entire week and enjoyed every minute of it.  The waiters were on top of their game and extremely attentive and friendly.  We stayed over Easter week when the resort was clearly crowded and still never felt like we didn't get perfect service.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, but no late check out
Summary: We stayed in the oceanview suite looking directly at the pool and the pacific ocean. The suites offer two marble bathrooms and two balconies.  Our suite was directly below the restaurant LOFT.  As such, we heard walking noises ALL NIGHT until the restaurant closed.  From check in to check out, we knew this place was different.  The location is absolutely beautiful.  As soon as you valet your car, the valet attendant notifies the front desk of your arrival and your information would be immediately available as soon as you check in.  The front desk will escort you directly to your room.  The hotel was booked to full capacity but it did not feel crowded for some reason.  You can still find lounge chairs by the pool unoccupied.  It just didn't feel overly crowded.  The restaurant
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Montage is a world class hotel offering understated luxury in a stunning location.  The California style decor and architecture are perfect in a setting that has to be one of the best on the coast.  Service is excellent, rooms comfortable and lovely.  The spa is beautiful and the work out room has the best view ever.  A nice touch are the candles by the bath, luxe toiletries, fabulous robes.  The only down side is the cost.  All the perfection is pricey.  Quite casual meals at the Mosaic restauant really expensive for what you get.  $20+ for a burger or salad.   The plus side is after a noon check out you can stay on and enjoy the pools, spa etc for the rest of the day.
Manager Response: none

We stayed here for a few days in 2003, the year it opened and loved it.  We returned this year in April for three days to celebrate my wife's birthday and to have dinner in their restaurant, The Studio.  However, after two days of missteps in service, poor quality in cocktails and food, we decided to not take a chance The Studio might have the same problems and canceled our reservation.  There was just something wrong at the hotel -- they seemed to be out of sync.  After we were there I decided to check on Trip Advisor to see if anyone else was having the same problems.  Bingo!  An April 20, 2011 Collisionwork posted his review.  I read it to my wife and she

I understand you and your wife were celebrating a special occasion, and I am very sorry your experience was not as you had hoped or expected.  I too am deeply disappointed to hear that your experience was so below Montage standards.  I would like to speak to you further personally about this; I will send you a message privately with my contact information.  I hope to connect with you soon. Summary: My wife and I had the pleasure of attending a professional conference at Montage, and decided to stay a couple days extra for some leisure time. Montage was magnificent! Beautiful property, excellent service, luxurious rooms. A spectacular experience. We were very impressed.
Manager Response: none

While walking, my fianc√© had trouble keeping up as the staff member appeared to be in a hurry and wasn‚Äôt slowing down. My fianc√© was in heels, which made it difficult to keep pace. Later our luggage arrived and the gentleman delivering the luggage made time to answer all of our questions. We made light of the situation and understood that she was
Manager Response: We thank you and your fianc√© for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. We are grateful that you chose to spend time with us. Summary: Our stay was one of the most memorable experiences to date as a family.  The service, staff, accomadations were 10 out of 10.  It's not geared towards families with small kids but our teenagers loved the experience and the awesome surfing beach below.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: GREATEST SERVICE EXPERIENCE I'VE SEEN... AND I'VE STAYED @ A LOT OF 5 STARS!
Summary: My title really captures our expirience at this hotel. From a product standpoint, its just as nice as any Four Seasons or Ritz, but the service of the staff at this hotel was exceptional. They really have that personal touch that anyone would want staying at a hotel of this class. When we checked in, we waited for the bellman, the front desk agent started small talking with me and walked us to our room. I mentioned how we wanted to sleep in since we didn't have our dog with us to take for a walk in the early morning. Minutes later, the bellman arrived with a little doggie gift to bring back home to our dog. Beyond the service, the hotel sits on the cliffs of Laguna Beach right on the ocean and portrays an amazing view of the pacific. The room decor was a little dated for my
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Incredible location, phenominal service, easily the best 5-star in Laguna Beach!!
Summary: Having worked in the hotel industry for many years, I have visited a variety of lovely properties and am well versed when it comes to critiquing good service.  Laguna Beach is one of my favorite places in the world, but until recently, I had not yet stayed at the Montage.  So how was the experience?  Nothing short of exceptional!!  Let's start from the check-in experience...they actually walk you to your room and check you in in-suite!!!  I have never seen this at a hotel in California and it was a pleasant departure from the norm.  The front desk staff was genuinely friendly and showed sincere interest in my life.  The rooms were quite comfortable with all the typical 5-star amenities, but with a few things I just loved.  First off, whatever you're watching on the TV in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great hotel, it is a must stay at. It seems every room in the hotel, has an ocean view, excellent staff, the whole hotel is clean and wonderful. I would like to thank Sam Fuerstmen, for giving me excellent service. I cant wait to return.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was able to stay for 2 nights this past March. Travelled with my husband and son. Our son lives quite far from us now so this was a relaxing, reconnecting couple of days. The Montage is not someplace we would normally stay at due to the price being a little high for us. Luckily I had a gift certificate for a couple of nights and we were quite excited to visit Laguna Beach.  The Montage was absolutely one of the best experiences we have ever had. From the moment we arrived, until we left, we really loved staying here. It was high end but so comfortable.  Our room was spotless. There was a lovely bottle of California sparking wine waiting for us upon our entry, really nice touch. The views are really breathtaking. Most rooms have a small balcony facing the ocean. The best was one
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I have often thought of staying at the Montage Laguna Beach due to its popularity and reviews. This past weekend we had this opportunity due to a close friend who was married there. First, the Montage lived up to all expectations of outstanding service, cleanliness and its beautiful location. The staff, from the time you arrive seem to take personal attention to your arrival and process of checking in. You may say that this is expected of such an establishment...but nevertheless if it is expected, the staff seems to genuinely take pride in what they are doing. The food at the wedding was amazing as was the service. We also had the opportunity to dine at the Loft downstairs where the bartender provided wonderful service and the food there was delicious as well.
Manager Response: I am delighted that the happy occasion of your friend‚Äôs marriage brought you to join us at Montage Laguna Beach. We are pleased that the location, cleanliness and service exceeded your expectations. Montage is fortunate to have amazing associates who go great lengths to ensure a memorable experience.  I‚Äôm glad that their passion was evident and that you plan to return for another relaxing stay.    All the best,   Todd Orlich

Summary: My husband and I and our son-  stayed there one night -  we were visiting a medical specialist in the area.  This place was breathtaking.  the views and beach were beautiful.  The service was great.  Our room were pleasant, not overdone. The restaurant was great we ate breakfast and dinner .  I would recommend it for any traveller!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review; your recommendations are sincerely appreciated. It is always great to hear when our guests had a flawless stay. I am pleased that your time with us was so memorable and we look forward to many more relaxing stays.

Summary: As someone wrote before me: if you have the money, why not? Montage is a very nice and charming beach Hotel. The rooms big and well decorated with a comfortable bathroom. Service is good but could be more "natural". Staff is friendly but sometimes seems artificial. Swimming pool and the walk around the beach are beautiful. But you pay a high price for that. You will find rich and sometimes snobbish people around. Overall, very nice stay in a beautiful atmosphere.
Manager Response: Montage Laguna Beach strives to give our guests the most comfortable experience possible; I am delighted that yours was so relaxing. We appreciate your recent visit to the property and thank you for your feedback. Our associates are well attuned to guest needs and will go great lengths to make our guests feel at home. I apologize that your interactions were anything less than this. We would be grateful for the opportunity to extend the welcoming service that Montage is known for in the future and encourage you to continue checking rates and availability as we do offer specials throughout the year. I will send you a private message with my contact information. Please call me if you would like to discuss any issues at length. I look forward to your future visits.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: We stayed at The Montage the last few days of December including New Year's Eve.  THIS IS A MOST AMAZING PLACE!!!  THE VIEWS AND SPA ARE INCREDIBLE!!  The service from the very start was excellent.  Michelle was especially helpful in getting us into our room and answering any questions throughout our stay.  Make no mistake, this is a pricey place.  Everything is expensive and if you are not prepared to spend the money, then don't even bother to book your rooms.    The only drawback to this hotel is the rather highly overrated "award winning" food.  It is extremely costly to eat here and the food is extremely pretentious and overpriced and most importantly not very good.      We loved the breakfast in The Loft, but prepare to spend over $100 on breakfast for two.    The Mosaic
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed a relaxing visit to Montage Laguna Beach. I would like to thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on TripAdvisor. I will start by saying how delighted I am that your time spent at Spa Montage was so enjoyable and that you received excellent service. Thank you for your appreciation and commendation which has been shared with the spa and Michelle in Guest Reception. I apologize for the negative experience you had in Studio. Also, I am truly sorry that the level of service at the dining outlets did not match up with the caliber of service in the rest of the resort. I will send you a private message that includes my contact information. I would look forward to hearing from you so that we can properly follow up and discuss how to better serve you in the future.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: Never thought I would be in a hotel that covers every little detail like this hotel.  If you don't stay at the Spa Montage you have skipped a must "DO" in your life time.  When you have the valet get your car and there are complimentary waters and complimentary hats on your dash...that's class!!!!!
Manager Response: I am so pleased that your relaxing stay was enhanced by Spa Montage. We pride ourselves on paying great attention to detail in order to ensure a truly memorable experience. We believe it is the little touches that set us apart, and I  am delighted that your experience exceeded your expectations. We look forward to many more.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary Heading: Feels like a culture more than a hotel, where high society meets to relax and enjoy their money.
Summary: This hotel is fantastic on all counts.  Extremely well thought out design.  It focuses on the views which are completely spectacular.  Sky meets ocean and the windows will accentuate the grandness of the horizon every which way you look.  The staff greet you in a manner that is warm, welcoming, accommodating, asking where we came from and ensuring we felt immediately relaxed by sharing where they come from.  An excellent technique considering the grounds can potentially be intimidating (no matter who you are) as they are exceptionally upscale.  The price point is very high.  I have been to many hotels that are higher but have been in vacation locations in the tropics and they often include a butler service and all inclusive foods.  The rooms are wonderful, views incredible,

We thank both you and your husband for choosing to spend your New Year‚Äôs with us. Summary Heading: Great hotel in outstanding location with unique view
Summary: Highly recommendable hotel e.g. for guests who search a romantic place with outstanding view on the ocean. The hotel is located at the South Coast Highway directly on the sea. The lobby-level is in an upper level of the hotel and you go downstairs to the pool, terrase and ocean as it is built in terrasse-style on a hill. The hotel offers 250 rooms but does not seem that big. You can enjoy breakfast on the balcony with view at the oceon. The breakfast is simply delicous, also we had dinner in 2 of the hotel¬¥s restaurants: The Mosaic Bar & Grill and The Studio, which is located in a separate building in the park of the hotel at pool-level. At the opposite of the hotel there is a drugstore for any needs.
Manager Response: We thank you for your recent visit to the resort and are grateful that you chose to share your experience on TripAdvisor. I am delighted that you enjoyed a romantic and rejuvenating getaway. Your praise of Mosaic and Studio is sincerely appreciated. We hope to share many more relaxing experiences with you. The incredible ocean views and beautiful setting will be waiting for you when you return.   All the best,   Todd Orlich

Summary Heading: Simply Beautiful Location, great rooms.  If you have the money, why not
Summary: Simple...if you have the money to stay here, you'll enjoy it.  Outstanding location, simply beautiful....you know it used to be a trailer park.    You'll enjoy you stay and feel like a king if you stay here.  But, keep in mind this all comes at a price.  If I were paying for it, I probably would feel differently.    If you can't afford it, by al means stop by to see the view and have a drink or a walk around the property.  Public parking is nearby.    But if you can afford it, book a room and enjoy one of the best experiences you can have.
Manager Response: I would like to take a moment and thank you for your great feedback of Montage Laguna Beach and for your most recent visit. We look forward to welcoming you back for many more relaxing experiences. We hope you will visit us again and we can become your new home away from home.   Warm Regards,   Todd Orlich

Summary Heading: Will visit, but will never stay here again
Summary: We are frequent  visitors of the Montage and have had dinner there several times at the Studio restaurant. Our dining experiences, though expensive, have been very memorable and special.  We also have stayed at several high end hotels (Four Seasons, The Ritz, St. Regis, etc.) so we had the same level of expectations for this hotel (especially since the rates at the Montage are a lot more expensive than these high end hotels).  We decided to stay there for the first time for our 1 year wedding anniversary. When they checked us in, they put us in a noisy room above the pool equipment. We did not complain because we are not the complaining type. We tried to make the best of it.   When we went to the pool, the service was horrible and non-existent. During our entire time at the pool
Manager Response: Congratulations on your one year wedding anniversary and thank you for choosing to spend such as special occasion at Montage Laguna Beach. We are grateful for your continued loyalty Studio, and hope to instill the same sense of loyalty for the entire resort.   I would like to express my disappointment that you did not receive the excellent level of service Montage is known for. The lack of attention at the pool bar as well as the long delays with our bell service was unacceptable. I apologize on behalf of the manager you spoke with as the issues you expressed should have been followed up with immediately. I would like to revisit these issues in order to properly follow up with you. I will send you a private message with my contact information. I look forward to speaking with you.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich

Summary: We stayed here as one of our stops driving from San Francisco to San Diego along highway 1.   On arrival, we were taken straight to the  room for checkin plus there was a half bottle of chilled sparkling wine to greet us! We were in room 572 which was lovely with great views. The furnishings were delightful and the bed was so comfortable. I usually wouldn't even think to comment on the bathrobes provided by a hotel, but the ones here were so soft and comforting I could have worn them the entire stay!   The service is impeccable. The grounds are gorgeous with a lovely swimming pool. We had drinks in the lobby bar - a spectacular view from the terrace but also spectacular prices.¬†  We had dinner both nights at the Loft restaurant in the hotel. The first night the service was
Manager Response: We are truly delighted that you counted Montage Laguna Beach among one of the many highlights of your road trip. Thank you for your feedback regarding both the internet and valet charges. I am disappointed that these two components put a damper on an otherwise flawless stay. I would be happy to follow up with you personally and discuss how we can amend any such issues your next visit. I will send you a private message with my information. Please feel free to call me.   All the best,   Todd Orlich

Summary: From the moment we arrived at the hotel until the moment we left early Tuesday morning we knew we were at a very special place.  There was no detail left unattended to.  From our check in to the service we received at the pool to the very special birthday cake your pastry chef made for our daughter's 2nd birthday...everything was perfect.  We've traveled around the world before and after having our daughter and I would be remiss to not share how truly wonderful an experience this was for us.    The details provided in our room for our daughter were amazing.  We've stayed at many high end hotels and this truly was the BEST crib she's ever had away from home.  I loved that the hotel also had a diaper pail.  One of the little comforts in life when you have kids.  A stand out moment
Manager Response: Good day,   Thank you for your trip to Montage Laguna Beach and your praise on TripAdvisor. We constantly strive to give our guests a perfect experience by paying close attention to details. I am delighted that your experience was nothing short of this. Happy belated birthday to your daughter; I hope this will continue to be a special place for the both of you. We look forward to many more years of celebrating.   All the best,   Todd Orlich

Summary Heading: Sometimes its a balance..where does luxury impede on pleasure. buyers remorse?
Summary: From the moment you are required to valet your car the service is impeccable. The rooms are beautifully designed and finished, no question. We arrived having stayed at Rancho Valencia where we had a private villa. Same cost.   Accostomed as I am to enjoying a cup of tea in the morning, Rancho had a kettle and china cups and a fully stocked fridge included in the room. At Montage One pot of hot water and one tea bag delivered to our room $19.25. You know its coming, but I would prefer to just get up and boil a kettle, is this service or overcharging. At Rancho there were fully stocked laundry rooms if you needed to wash anything , mitigating the need to pay $15 for a t shirt or such. Oh and free Wifi. Montage wanted you to pay. Although the shoe shine serice was a practical idea
Manager Response: Good day,   We thank you for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach and for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor. I would like to apologize for the disappointment you experienced during your time with us. We continually strive to become our guest‚Äôs destination of choice by providing truly customized service.  Considering what a seasoned traveler you are I especially appreciate your feedback. We would be honored to welcome you back to the resort and provide the seamless experience that Montage is known for. If you would like to discuss your experience further please call me personally at 949-715-6202.  Todd Orlich

Summary: The hotel is just about perfect.  When you check in you are immediately escorted to your room, where they take your credit card information.   The room is a nice size, with a huge bathroom, including a bath tub and shower.  The room had a couch and a nice porch overlooking the pool, with the ocean in the background.  It was ideal.    Service was truly first class.  No matter where you were the staff was friendly, almost too friendly, and could not help enough.    There were, however, two things that make this 5 star hotel only 4 star quality.  The valet service was almost always overwhelmed, and they took forever to get my (and apparently other) cars.  The bigger problem with the hotel is that you hear people talking in the hallway!   Whenever people would walk by, especially
Manager Response: Good day,   Thank you for your review on TripAdvisor and for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. I am delighted that your accommodations and the breathtaking ocean view made for a memorable visit. I apologize that our valet was less than prompt and failed to meet your expectations. Your feedback is greatly valued as we constantly look for opportunities to improve. We are pleased to welcome you back and reacquaint you with the areas of the resort you enjoyed as well as make every experience you have with us perfect.    Thank you,   Todd Orlich

Summary: It seems the management has a policy to nickle and dime you every time you turn around - and being the Montage these are relatively large $ amounts. In my mind, absolutely abhorrent behavior.   There are many nice hotels in Laguna Beach and much closer to town - stay somewhere, anywhere, else.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach. I apologize that your experience with us was anything less than perfect. I will also be responding to you privately with my contact information if you would like to discuss your experience further.   Todd Orlich

Summary: I have had the pleasure of staying in wonderful  hotels all over the world and the Montage in Laguna Beach is now at the top of my list.  From the moment we pulled up to the understated but beautiful entrance and saw the huge windows in the lobby looking out over the ocean we knew we were somewhere special.  Never before have we been escorted directly to our room instead of stopping at a check in desk.  We were oriented to all of the hotel amenities and treated to a split of champagne as we settled in. Our suite was gorgeous and had balconies overlooking the pool and the ocean.  The grounds of the hotel are beautifully landscaped, hummingbirds are everywhere, and there is a connection to a paved walkway along the cliff with numerous seating areas.  Easy access to the beach is
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your praise of Montage Laguna Beach on TripAdvisor.  I am pleased to hear you had such a relaxing visit and that you were able to enjoy the resort outlets and spa. We pride ourselves on being very attentive to detail. Satisfied guests are the best reward we could ask for.  We look forward to accommodating you in the future and continuing to be your destination of choice.  Todd Orlich

Summary: I stayed at the Montage for a business meeting. We enjoyed three great meals and the food and service was outstanding in every instance except for the halibut we had at dinner (dry and over-cooked). The room was really nice. Ocean view was outstanding.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach and for sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. We value your feedback and greatly appreciate your praise. I am delighted that your stay was so memorable and you were able to enjoy the breathtaking ocean view. We look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Experience From Start to Finish
Summary: After reading some of the reviews here, I was concerned that Montage might have some of that typical O.C. snob factor.  That was not the case at all.  The hotel is fabulous in all aspects.  From the moment I pulled up, I was treated exceptionally well by the staff.  The check-in process is by far the best I've experienced, with someone waiting with my room portfolio within seconds of me stepping out of my car.  As others have indicated, the view is just wonderful and the property is well-maintained.  I also found the food to be wonderful.  Attention to detail at the Montage is top-notch:  from the delicious bedtime chocolates and the chilled champagne waiting in your room at check-in, to the baseball caps on your dashboard when you check-out, the Montage does not disappoint.
Manager Response: Good day,   We thank you for sharing your recent experience to Montage Laguna Beach on TripAdvisor. Your praise and compliments have been shared with the team. I am pleased to hear that from check in to check out you received excellent service. Your feedback is very important to us as we constantly look for opportunities to improve. We hope to make your future stays truly seamless, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Todd Orlich

Summary Heading: Perfect room, service, view and amenities
Summary: I have stayed at the Montage about six times over the last 5 years and every stay has been incredible. The rooms are not the over the top "stuffed" luxury of a Ritz Carlton, but are authentic luxurious beach rooms. Incredible views and every amenity that you would expect from a five star hotel.  I have stayed at the best hotels in Hawaii, Mexico etc and would rank The Montage at the top!
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty to Montage Laguna Beach and for sharing your recent experience on TripAdvisor.  We are honored to be your destination of choice, especially considering what a seasoned traveler you are. We look forward to providing many more relaxing visits.    Todd Orlich

Summary: Never have I seen a resort run with such attention to detail. Of course Laguna is a wonderful place to be, but I would say our three night stay was not long enough.  There are interesting aspects of the resort for anyone of any age, interest, and is dog friendly too.  I loved the beach with  the crashing waves, little alcoves, and "tidepools". These are small see communities for fish, crab, shrimp, starfish, and sea urchants.  The tide and the rock formations create these communities for  beautiful sights that are montiored by naturalist who are very informative as well.  Maybe you would rather observe the resident hawks on the property. Four to six Hawks are on the property throughout the day. The owner and trainer is with them, but is very helpful in talking about the birds
Manager Response: Good Day,  We thank you for sharing your praise and feedback on TripAdvisor. I‚Äôm delighted to hear that attention to detail by the associates and the beautiful beach below us made for a relaxing stay. I‚Äôm glad you took time to explore the tide pools and that you also enjoyed speaking with our resort falconneer.  We look forward to making your next stay just as memorable; I hope you‚Äôll be able to stay longer and enjoy the breathtaking sunset night after night.   Best,  Todd Orlich General Manager

Summary Heading: Hands down one of nicest hotels out there
Summary: Absolutely top notch service the entire time, ultra clean hotel and rooms, fantastic pool and the view is just amazing.  This place is expensive and well worth it.    My wife and I did a free Beach Bootcamp in the morning one day and it was a serious workout, i thought i was going to have a heart attack.  They said we burned about 800 calories in the hour long class on the beach.  Luckily the bellhop gave me directions to an In-n-Out Burger so I could get those calories back asap.  The views from the rooms, pool and dining are out of this world.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to share your experience at Montage Laguna Beach. I‚Äôm delighted to hear that your accommodations were comfortable and you enjoyed the breathtaking view. We strive to give every guest truly customized service, I am pleased to hear that you had such a great work out and experience at beach boot camp. Your appreciation and commendation has been shared with the wellness team. We look forward to making your next stay just as memorable.  Todd Orlich

Summary: They refused to wait on us in the restaurant because we wanted the wine pairings tasting menu.  Said we might get drunk.  Why have a wine pairing menu if you don't want to serve it.  Would never go back there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hotel and Staff, overpriced and mediocre food at the loft
Summary: Stayed here for my birthday and my experience at the Montage was different than what I was expecting and so left the resort with mixed feelings. A half bottle of champagne is a nice welcoming gift.  For the best views, do request an upper level South facing room. You will have beautiful views of the white sand beach with lovely light blue water.  Wonderful bath amentities abound including robes and slippers.  The Montage offers beach lounge chairs, towels and umbrellas for their guests. You will be sharing the beach with the locals (in the know) who also utilize the beautiful cliffside walk, bathrooms and ramp to the beach.  Do check out the arch at the beach and walk to Aliso creek and back. The pool attendants will set you up at luxurious cushioned chaise lounges.  The best
Manager Response: We thank you for sharing your experience at Montage Laguna Beach on Trip Advisor. It is wonderful to hear that you were treated so graciously by the associates. Your appreciation and commendation has been shared with the team. Thank you for also sharing your experience at The Loft; it was certainly not to our Montage standard. Your feedback is very important as we strive to make every guest‚Äôs experience perfect. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Best,   Todd Orlich General Manager

Summary: The main disappointment was with food quality. I ate at the loft and both poolside outlets and despite the pretty pictures, wonderful description, and awards the food was extremely average with generally slow service.  It ranked about the same as a business class hotel, not the extravagant indulgence I would expect. I recommend eating somewhere else as the prices are so steep. I'd put it alongside a Longhorn.  The beach was good except they will not serve alcohol to you so you have to trudge up the hill and get this yourself.  There should be some way even if you have to get this yourself due to some law that one does not have to go up and down all of the time.  We also had very large charges added to our bill that we did not make. They took them off fortunately but I HIGHLY
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach.  We appreciate your feedback and apologize for the issues you encountered during your time with us.  We do not wish for any of our guests to leave feeling dissatisfied.  I want to assure you that we truly appreciate your feedback and make every effort to correct any issue that is not to our standards. Montage Laguna Beach prides itself on providing truly customized service with a keen attention to detail, and I apologize that you didn‚Äôt experience this during your stay. We hope to make your future stays much more memorable, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.   Sincerely,  Todd Orlich General Manager

Summary Heading: Great view... one of the nicest hotel I have been to!!
Summary: Great hotel with beautiful ocean view. The service was OK but the view will cover all errors. The electricity went off for 40 minutes at noon. But as I said the view and the freshness of the ocean breeze will subdue most of shortcomings.  I will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We sincerely thank you for taking the time to share your experience at Montage Laguna Beach on Trip Advisor. We are pleased that the ocean set such a beautiful backdrop for a relaxing stay. We strive for every experience you have with us to be perfect, and I apologize for any issues you encountered that didn't meet your expectations. We look forward to welcoming you back again very soon.   Sincerely,   Todd Orlich General Manager

Summary: Highly recommend the Montage Laguna Beach and hats off to Chief Craig Strong, you deserve a five star.......
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit to Montage Laguna Beach.  We appreciate your praise and are so pleased you enjoyed your time at Studio with Chef Strong.  It is wonderful to hear that your overnight stay and dining experience was nothing short of perfect. We look forward to welcoming you back for future visits.   Best,   Todd Orlich General Manager

Summary Heading: The Wow Factor is definitely in evidence here!
Summary: Our recent stay here was simply wonderful and just as a luxury hotel and resort should be. We had an ocean front room with a Terrace overlooking the entire property and the ocean. The room was gorgeous.Sitting out on the Terrace was so relaxing listening to the waves and enjoying a glass of wine. When we arrived,we were personally greeted and escorted to our room with a stop off at the lobby bar terrace for an overview of the property by the assistant who was warm and welcoming. The sofa's and chairs in that area were like a home from home with flawless service if you wanted a drink or a bite to eat.
